00064 /* ************** widget base functions ************** */
00065 /*
00066  * - in: roundbox codes for corner types and radius
00067  * - return: array of [size][2][x,y] points, the edges of the roundbox, + UV coords
00068  *
00069  * - draw black box with alpha 0 on exact button boundbox
00070  * - for ever AA step:
00071  *    - draw the inner part for a round filled box, with color blend codes or texture coords
00072  *    - draw outline in outline color
00073  *    - draw outer part, bottom half, extruded 1 pixel to bottom, for emboss shadow
00074  *    - draw extra decorations
00075  * - draw background color box with alpha 1 on exact button boundbox
00076  */
00077 
00078 /* fill this struct with polygon info to draw AA'ed */
00079 /* it has outline, back, and two optional tria meshes */
00080 
00081 typedef struct uiWidgetTrias {
00082     unsigned int tot;
00083     
00084     float vec[32][2];
00085     unsigned int (*index)[3];
00086     
00087 } uiWidgetTrias;
00088 
00089 /* max as used by round_box__edges */
00090 #define WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU 9
00091 #define WIDGET_SIZE_MAX (WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU * 4)
00092 
00093 typedef struct uiWidgetBase {
00094     
00095     int totvert, halfwayvert;
00096     float outer_v[WIDGET_SIZE_MAX][2];
00097     float inner_v[WIDGET_SIZE_MAX][2];
00098     float inner_uv[WIDGET_SIZE_MAX][2];
00099     
00100     short inner, outline, emboss; /* set on/off */
00101     short shadedir;
00102     
00103     uiWidgetTrias tria1;
00104     uiWidgetTrias tria2;
00105     
00106 } uiWidgetBase;

00191 void ui_draw_anti_tria(float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2, float x3, float y3)
00192 {
00193     float tri_arr[3][2] = {{x1, y1}, {x2, y2}, {x3, y3}};
00194     float color[4];
00195     int j;
00196     
00197     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00198     glGetFloatv(GL_CURRENT_COLOR, color);
00199     color[3] *= 0.125f;
00200     glColor4fv(color);
00201 
00202     glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00203     glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, tri_arr);
00204 
00205     /* for each AA step */
00206     for (j = 0; j < WIDGET_AA_JITTER; j++) {
00207         glTranslatef(1.0f * jit[j][0], 1.0f * jit[j][1], 0.0f);
00208         glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, 0, 3);
00209         glTranslatef(-1.0f * jit[j][0], -1.0f * jit[j][1], 0.0f);
00210     }
00211 
00212     glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00213     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00214 }
00215 
00216 void ui_draw_anti_roundbox(int mode, float minx, float miny, float maxx, float maxy, float rad)
00217 {
00218     float color[4];
00219     int j;
00220     
00221     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00222     glGetFloatv(GL_CURRENT_COLOR, color);
00223     color[3] *= 0.125f;
00224     glColor4fv(color);
00225     
00226     for (j = 0; j < WIDGET_AA_JITTER; j++) {
00227         glTranslatef(1.0f * jit[j][0], 1.0f * jit[j][1], 0.0f);
00228         uiDrawBox(mode, minx, miny, maxx, maxy, rad);
00229         glTranslatef(-1.0f * jit[j][0], -1.0f * jit[j][1], 0.0f);
00230     }
00231 
00232     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00233 }

00235 static void widget_init(uiWidgetBase *wtb)
00236 {
00237     wtb->totvert = wtb->halfwayvert = 0;
00238     wtb->tria1.tot = 0;
00239     wtb->tria2.tot = 0;
00240 
00241     wtb->inner = 1;
00242     wtb->outline = 1;
00243     wtb->emboss = 1;
00244     wtb->shadedir = 1;

00247 /* helper call, makes shadow rect, with 'sun' above menu, so only shadow to left/right/bottom */
00248 /* return tot */
00249 static int round_box_shadow_edges(float (*vert)[2], rcti *rect, float rad, int roundboxalign, float step)
00250 {
00251     float vec[WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU][2];
00252     float minx, miny, maxx, maxy;
00253     int a, tot = 0;
00254     
00255     rad += step;
00256     
00257     if (2.0f * rad > rect->ymax - rect->ymin)
00258         rad = 0.5f * (rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
00259     
00260     minx = rect->xmin - step;
00261     miny = rect->ymin - step;
00262     maxx = rect->xmax + step;
00263     maxy = rect->ymax + step;
00264     
00265     /* mult */
00266     for (a = 0; a < WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU; a++) {
00267         vec[a][0] = rad * cornervec[a][0];
00268         vec[a][1] = rad * cornervec[a][1];
00269     }
00270     
00271     /* start with left-top, anti clockwise */
00272     if (roundboxalign & UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT) {
00273         for (a = 0; a < WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU; a++, tot++) {
00274             vert[tot][0] = minx + rad - vec[a][0];
00275             vert[tot][1] = maxy - vec[a][1];
00276         }
00277     }
00278     else {
00279         for (a = 0; a < WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU; a++, tot++) {
00280             vert[tot][0] = minx;
00281             vert[tot][1] = maxy;
00282         }
00283     }
00284     
00285     if (roundboxalign & UI_CNR_BOTTOM_LEFT) {
00286         for (a = 0; a < WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU; a++, tot++) {
00287             vert[tot][0] = minx + vec[a][1];
00288             vert[tot][1] = miny + rad - vec[a][0];
00289         }
00290     }
00291     else {
00292         for (a = 0; a < WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU; a++, tot++) {
00293             vert[tot][0] = minx;
00294             vert[tot][1] = miny;
00295         }
00296     }
00297     
00298     if (roundboxalign & UI_CNR_BOTTOM_RIGHT) {
00299         for (a = 0; a < WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU; a++, tot++) {
00300             vert[tot][0] = maxx - rad + vec[a][0];
00301             vert[tot][1] = miny + vec[a][1];
00302         }
00303     }
00304     else {
00305         for (a = 0; a < WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU; a++, tot++) {
00306             vert[tot][0] = maxx;
00307             vert[tot][1] = miny;
00308         }
00309     }
00310     
00311     if (roundboxalign & UI_CNR_TOP_RIGHT) {
00312         for (a = 0; a < WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU; a++, tot++) {
00313             vert[tot][0] = maxx - vec[a][1];
00314             vert[tot][1] = maxy - rad + vec[a][0];
00315         }
00316     }
00317     else {
00318         for (a = 0; a < WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU; a++, tot++) {
00319             vert[tot][0] = maxx;
00320             vert[tot][1] = maxy;
00321         }
00322     }
00323     return tot;
00324 }
00325 
00326 /* this call has 1 extra arg to allow mask outline */
00327 static void round_box__edges(uiWidgetBase *wt, int roundboxalign, rcti *rect, float rad, float radi)
00328 {
00329     float vec[WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU][2], veci[WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU][2];
00330     float minx = rect->xmin, miny = rect->ymin, maxx = rect->xmax, maxy = rect->ymax;
00331     float minxi = minx + 1.0f; /* boundbox inner */
00332     float maxxi = maxx - 1.0f;
00333     float minyi = miny + 1.0f;
00334     float maxyi = maxy - 1.0f;
00335     float facxi = (maxxi != minxi) ? 1.0f / (maxxi - minxi) : 0.0f; /* for uv, can divide by zero */
00336     float facyi = (maxyi != minyi) ? 1.0f / (maxyi - minyi) : 0.0f;
00337     int a, tot = 0, minsize;
00338     const int hnum = ((roundboxalign & (UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT | UI_CNR_TOP_RIGHT)) == (UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT | UI_CNR_TOP_RIGHT) ||
00339                       (roundboxalign & (UI_CNR_BOTTOM_RIGHT | UI_CNR_BOTTOM_LEFT)) == (UI_CNR_BOTTOM_RIGHT | UI_CNR_BOTTOM_LEFT)) ? 1 : 2;
00340     const int vnum = ((roundboxalign & (UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT | UI_CNR_BOTTOM_LEFT)) == (UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT | UI_CNR_BOTTOM_LEFT) ||
00341                       (roundboxalign & (UI_CNR_TOP_RIGHT | UI_CNR_BOTTOM_RIGHT)) == (UI_CNR_TOP_RIGHT | UI_CNR_BOTTOM_RIGHT)) ? 1 : 2;
00342 
00343     minsize = MIN2((rect->xmax - rect->xmin) * hnum, (rect->ymax - rect->ymin) * vnum);
00344     
00345     if (2.0f * rad > minsize)
00346         rad = 0.5f * minsize;
00347 
00348     if (2.0f * (radi + 1.0f) > minsize)
00349         radi = 0.5f * minsize - 1.0f;
00350     
00351     /* mult */
00352     for (a = 0; a < WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU; a++) {
00353         veci[a][0] = radi * cornervec[a][0];
00354         veci[a][1] = radi * cornervec[a][1];
00355         vec[a][0] = rad * cornervec[a][0];
00356         vec[a][1] = rad * cornervec[a][1];
00357     }
00358     
00359     /* corner left-bottom */
00360     if (roundboxalign & UI_CNR_BOTTOM_LEFT) {
00361         
00362         for (a = 0; a < WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU; a++, tot++) {
00363             wt->inner_v[tot][0] = minxi + veci[a][1];
00364             wt->inner_v[tot][1] = minyi + radi - veci[a][0];
00365             
00366             wt->outer_v[tot][0] = minx + vec[a][1];
00367             wt->outer_v[tot][1] = miny + rad - vec[a][0];
00368             
00369             wt->inner_uv[tot][0] = facxi * (wt->inner_v[tot][0] - minxi);
00370             wt->inner_uv[tot][1] = facyi * (wt->inner_v[tot][1] - minyi);
00371         }
00372     }
00373     else {
00374         wt->inner_v[tot][0] = minxi;
00375         wt->inner_v[tot][1] = minyi;
00376         
00377         wt->outer_v[tot][0] = minx;
00378         wt->outer_v[tot][1] = miny;
00379 
00380         wt->inner_uv[tot][0] = 0.0f;
00381         wt->inner_uv[tot][1] = 0.0f;
00382         
00383         tot++;
00384     }
00385     
00386     /* corner right-bottom */
00387     if (roundboxalign & UI_CNR_BOTTOM_RIGHT) {
00388         
00389         for (a = 0; a < WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU; a++, tot++) {
00390             wt->inner_v[tot][0] = maxxi - radi + veci[a][0];
00391             wt->inner_v[tot][1] = minyi + veci[a][1];
00392             
00393             wt->outer_v[tot][0] = maxx - rad + vec[a][0];
00394             wt->outer_v[tot][1] = miny + vec[a][1];
00395             
00396             wt->inner_uv[tot][0] = facxi * (wt->inner_v[tot][0] - minxi);
00397             wt->inner_uv[tot][1] = facyi * (wt->inner_v[tot][1] - minyi);
00398         }
00399     }
00400     else {
00401         wt->inner_v[tot][0] = maxxi;
00402         wt->inner_v[tot][1] = minyi;
00403         
00404         wt->outer_v[tot][0] = maxx;
00405         wt->outer_v[tot][1] = miny;
00406 
00407         wt->inner_uv[tot][0] = 1.0f;
00408         wt->inner_uv[tot][1] = 0.0f;
00409         
00410         tot++;
00411     }
00412     
00413     wt->halfwayvert = tot;
00414     
00415     /* corner right-top */
00416     if (roundboxalign & UI_CNR_TOP_RIGHT) {
00417         
00418         for (a = 0; a < WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU; a++, tot++) {
00419             wt->inner_v[tot][0] = maxxi - veci[a][1];
00420             wt->inner_v[tot][1] = maxyi - radi + veci[a][0];
00421             
00422             wt->outer_v[tot][0] = maxx - vec[a][1];
00423             wt->outer_v[tot][1] = maxy - rad + vec[a][0];
00424             
00425             wt->inner_uv[tot][0] = facxi * (wt->inner_v[tot][0] - minxi);
00426             wt->inner_uv[tot][1] = facyi * (wt->inner_v[tot][1] - minyi);
00427         }
00428     }
00429     else {
00430         wt->inner_v[tot][0] = maxxi;
00431         wt->inner_v[tot][1] = maxyi;
00432         
00433         wt->outer_v[tot][0] = maxx;
00434         wt->outer_v[tot][1] = maxy;
00435         
00436         wt->inner_uv[tot][0] = 1.0f;
00437         wt->inner_uv[tot][1] = 1.0f;
00438         
00439         tot++;
00440     }
00441     
00442     /* corner left-top */
00443     if (roundboxalign & UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT) {
00444         
00445         for (a = 0; a < WIDGET_CURVE_RESOLU; a++, tot++) {
00446             wt->inner_v[tot][0] = minxi + radi - veci[a][0];
00447             wt->inner_v[tot][1] = maxyi - veci[a][1];
00448             
00449             wt->outer_v[tot][0] = minx + rad - vec[a][0];
00450             wt->outer_v[tot][1] = maxy - vec[a][1];
00451             
00452             wt->inner_uv[tot][0] = facxi * (wt->inner_v[tot][0] - minxi);
00453             wt->inner_uv[tot][1] = facyi * (wt->inner_v[tot][1] - minyi);
00454         }
00455         
00456     }
00457     else {
00458         
00459         wt->inner_v[tot][0] = minxi;
00460         wt->inner_v[tot][1] = maxyi;
00461         
00462         wt->outer_v[tot][0] = minx;
00463         wt->outer_v[tot][1] = maxy;
00464         
00465         wt->inner_uv[tot][0] = 0.0f;
00466         wt->inner_uv[tot][1] = 1.0f;
00467         
00468         tot++;
00469     }
00470 
00471     BLI_assert(tot <= WIDGET_SIZE_MAX);
00472 
00473     wt->totvert = tot;
00474 }
00475 
00476 static void round_box_edges(uiWidgetBase *wt, int roundboxalign, rcti *rect, float rad)
00477 {
00478     round_box__edges(wt, roundboxalign, rect, rad, rad - 1.0f);
00479 }

00482 /* based on button rect, return scaled array of triangles */
00483 static void widget_num_tria(uiWidgetTrias *tria, rcti *rect, float triasize, char where)
00484 {
00485     float centx, centy, sizex, sizey, minsize;
00486     int a, i1 = 0, i2 = 1;
00487     
00488     minsize = MIN2(rect->xmax - rect->xmin, rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
00489     
00490     /* center position and size */
00491     centx = (float)rect->xmin + 0.5f * minsize;
00492     centy = (float)rect->ymin + 0.5f * minsize;
00493     sizex = sizey = -0.5f * triasize * minsize;
00494 
00495     if (where == 'r') {
00496         centx = (float)rect->xmax - 0.5f * minsize;
00497         sizex = -sizex;
00498     }   
00499     else if (where == 't') {
00500         centy = (float)rect->ymax - 0.5f * minsize;
00501         sizey = -sizey;
00502         i2 = 0; i1 = 1;
00503     }   
00504     else if (where == 'b') {
00505         sizex = -sizex;
00506         i2 = 0; i1 = 1;
00507     }   
00508     
00509     for (a = 0; a < 3; a++) {
00510         tria->vec[a][0] = sizex * num_tria_vert[a][i1] + centx;
00511         tria->vec[a][1] = sizey * num_tria_vert[a][i2] + centy;
00512     }
00513     
00514     tria->tot = 1;
00515     tria->index = num_tria_face;
00516 }
00517 
00518 static void widget_scroll_circle(uiWidgetTrias *tria, rcti *rect, float triasize, char where)
00519 {
00520     float centx, centy, sizex, sizey, minsize;
00521     int a, i1 = 0, i2 = 1;
00522     
00523     minsize = MIN2(rect->xmax - rect->xmin, rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
00524     
00525     /* center position and size */
00526     centx = (float)rect->xmin + 0.5f * minsize;
00527     centy = (float)rect->ymin + 0.5f * minsize;
00528     sizex = sizey = -0.5f * triasize * minsize;
00529 
00530     if (where == 'r') {
00531         centx = (float)rect->xmax - 0.5f * minsize;
00532         sizex = -sizex;
00533     }   
00534     else if (where == 't') {
00535         centy = (float)rect->ymax - 0.5f * minsize;
00536         sizey = -sizey;
00537         i2 = 0; i1 = 1;
00538     }   
00539     else if (where == 'b') {
00540         sizex = -sizex;
00541         i2 = 0; i1 = 1;
00542     }   
00543     
00544     for (a = 0; a < 16; a++) {
00545         tria->vec[a][0] = sizex * scroll_circle_vert[a][i1] + centx;
00546         tria->vec[a][1] = sizey * scroll_circle_vert[a][i2] + centy;
00547     }
00548     
00549     tria->tot = 14;
00550     tria->index = scroll_circle_face;
00551 }
00552 
00553 static void widget_trias_draw(uiWidgetTrias *tria)
00554 {
00555     glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00556     glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, tria->vec);
00557     glDrawElements(GL_TRIANGLES, tria->tot * 3, GL_UNSIGNED_INT, tria->index);
00558     glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00559 }
00560 
00561 static void widget_menu_trias(uiWidgetTrias *tria, rcti *rect)
00562 {
00563     float centx, centy, size, asp;
00564     int a;
00565         
00566     /* center position and size */
00567     centx = rect->xmax - 0.5f * (rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
00568     centy = rect->ymin + 0.5f * (rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
00569     size = 0.4f * (rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
00570     
00571     /* XXX exception */
00572     asp = ((float)rect->xmax - rect->xmin) / ((float)rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
00573     if (asp > 1.2f && asp < 2.6f)
00574         centx = rect->xmax - 0.3f * (rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
00575     
00576     for (a = 0; a < 6; a++) {
00577         tria->vec[a][0] = size * menu_tria_vert[a][0] + centx;
00578         tria->vec[a][1] = size * menu_tria_vert[a][1] + centy;
00579     }
00580 
00581     tria->tot = 2;
00582     tria->index = menu_tria_face;
00583 }
00584 
00585 static void widget_check_trias(uiWidgetTrias *tria, rcti *rect)
00586 {
00587     float centx, centy, size;
00588     int a;
00589     
00590     /* center position and size */
00591     centx = rect->xmin + 0.5f * (rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
00592     centy = rect->ymin + 0.5f * (rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
00593     size = 0.5f * (rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
00594     
00595     for (a = 0; a < 6; a++) {
00596         tria->vec[a][0] = size * check_tria_vert[a][0] + centx;
00597         tria->vec[a][1] = size * check_tria_vert[a][1] + centy;
00598     }
00599     
00600     tria->tot = 4;
00601     tria->index = check_tria_face;
00602 }
00603 
00604 
00605 /* prepares shade colors */
00606 static void shadecolors4(char coltop[4], char *coldown, const char *color, short shadetop, short shadedown)
00607 {
00608     
00609     coltop[0] = CLAMPIS(color[0] + shadetop, 0, 255);
00610     coltop[1] = CLAMPIS(color[1] + shadetop, 0, 255);
00611     coltop[2] = CLAMPIS(color[2] + shadetop, 0, 255);
00612     coltop[3] = color[3];
00613 
00614     coldown[0] = CLAMPIS(color[0] + shadedown, 0, 255);
00615     coldown[1] = CLAMPIS(color[1] + shadedown, 0, 255);
00616     coldown[2] = CLAMPIS(color[2] + shadedown, 0, 255);
00617     coldown[3] = color[3];
00618 }
00619 
00620 static void round_box_shade_col4_r(unsigned char col_r[4], const char col1[4], const char col2[4], const float fac)
00621 {
00622     const int faci = FTOCHAR(fac);
00623     const int facm = 255 - faci;
00624 
00625     col_r[0] = (faci * col1[0] + facm * col2[0]) >> 8;
00626     col_r[1] = (faci * col1[1] + facm * col2[1]) >> 8;
00627     col_r[2] = (faci * col1[2] + facm * col2[2]) >> 8;
00628     col_r[3] = (faci * col1[3] + facm * col2[3]) >> 8;
00629 }
00630 
00631 static void widget_verts_to_quad_strip(uiWidgetBase *wtb, const int totvert, float quad_strip[WIDGET_SIZE_MAX * 2 + 2][2])
00632 {
00633     int a;
00634     for (a = 0; a < totvert; a++) {
00635         copy_v2_v2(quad_strip[a * 2], wtb->outer_v[a]);
00636         copy_v2_v2(quad_strip[a * 2 + 1], wtb->inner_v[a]);
00637     }
00638     copy_v2_v2(quad_strip[a * 2], wtb->outer_v[0]);
00639     copy_v2_v2(quad_strip[a * 2 + 1], wtb->inner_v[0]);
00640 }
00641 
00642 static void widget_verts_to_quad_strip_open(uiWidgetBase *wtb, const int totvert, float quad_strip[WIDGET_SIZE_MAX * 2][2])
00643 {
00644     int a;
00645     for (a = 0; a < totvert; a++) {
00646         quad_strip[a * 2][0] = wtb->outer_v[a][0];
00647         quad_strip[a * 2][1] = wtb->outer_v[a][1];
00648         quad_strip[a * 2 + 1][0] = wtb->outer_v[a][0];
00649         quad_strip[a * 2 + 1][1] = wtb->outer_v[a][1] - 1.0f;
00650     }
00651 }
00652 
00653 static void widgetbase_outline(uiWidgetBase *wtb)
00654 {
00655     float quad_strip[WIDGET_SIZE_MAX * 2 + 2][2]; /* + 2 because the last pair is wrapped */
00656     widget_verts_to_quad_strip(wtb, wtb->totvert, quad_strip);
00657 
00658     glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00659     glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, quad_strip);
00660     glDrawArrays(GL_QUAD_STRIP, 0, wtb->totvert * 2 + 2);
00661     glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00662 }
00663 
00664 static void widgetbase_draw(uiWidgetBase *wtb, uiWidgetColors *wcol)
00665 {
00666     int j, a;
00667     
00668     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00669 
00670     /* backdrop non AA */
00671     if (wtb->inner) {
00672         if (wcol->shaded == 0) {
00673             if (wcol->alpha_check) {
00674                 float inner_v_half[WIDGET_SIZE_MAX][2];
00675                 float x_mid = 0.0f; /* used for dumb clamping of values */
00676 
00677                 /* dark checkers */
00678                 glColor4ub(UI_TRANSP_DARK, UI_TRANSP_DARK, UI_TRANSP_DARK, 255);
00679                 glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00680                 glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, wtb->inner_v);
00681                 glDrawArrays(GL_POLYGON, 0, wtb->totvert);
00682                 glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00683 
00684                 /* light checkers */
00685                 glEnable(GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE);
00686                 glColor4ub(UI_TRANSP_LIGHT, UI_TRANSP_LIGHT, UI_TRANSP_LIGHT, 255);
00687                 glPolygonStipple(checker_stipple_sml);
00688 
00689                 glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00690                 glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, wtb->inner_v);
00691                 glDrawArrays(GL_POLYGON, 0, wtb->totvert);
00692                 glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00693 
00694                 glDisable(GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE);
00695 
00696                 /* alpha fill */
00697                 glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00698 
00699                 glColor4ubv((unsigned char *)wcol->inner);
00700                 glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00701 
00702                 for (a = 0; a < wtb->totvert; a++) {
00703                     x_mid += wtb->inner_v[a][0];
00704                 }
00705                 x_mid /= wtb->totvert;
00706 
00707                 glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, wtb->inner_v);
00708                 glDrawArrays(GL_POLYGON, 0, wtb->totvert);
00709                 glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00710 
00711                 /* 1/2 solid color */
00712                 glColor4ub(wcol->inner[0], wcol->inner[1], wcol->inner[2], 255);
00713 
00714                 for (a = 0; a < wtb->totvert; a++) {
00715                     inner_v_half[a][0] = MIN2(wtb->inner_v[a][0], x_mid);
00716                     inner_v_half[a][1] = wtb->inner_v[a][1];
00717                 }
00718 
00719                 glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00720                 glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, inner_v_half);
00721                 glDrawArrays(GL_POLYGON, 0, wtb->totvert);
00722                 glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00723             }
00724             else {
00725                 /* simple fill */
00726                 glColor4ubv((unsigned char *)wcol->inner);
00727 
00728                 glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00729                 glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, wtb->inner_v);
00730                 glDrawArrays(GL_POLYGON, 0, wtb->totvert);
00731                 glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00732             }
00733         }
00734         else {
00735             char col1[4], col2[4];
00736             unsigned char col_array[WIDGET_SIZE_MAX * 4];
00737             unsigned char *col_pt = col_array;
00738             
00739             shadecolors4(col1, col2, wcol->inner, wcol->shadetop, wcol->shadedown);
00740             
00741             glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00742             for (a = 0; a < wtb->totvert; a++, col_pt += 4) {
00743                 round_box_shade_col4_r(col_pt, col1, col2, wtb->inner_uv[a][wtb->shadedir]);
00744             }
00745 
00746             glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00747             glEnableClientState(GL_COLOR_ARRAY);
00748             glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, wtb->inner_v);
00749             glColorPointer(4, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, 0, col_array);
00750             glDrawArrays(GL_POLYGON, 0, wtb->totvert);
00751             glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00752             glDisableClientState(GL_COLOR_ARRAY);
00753 
00754             glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
00755         }
00756     }
00757     
00758     /* for each AA step */
00759     if (wtb->outline) {
00760         float quad_strip[WIDGET_SIZE_MAX * 2 + 2][2]; /* + 2 because the last pair is wrapped */
00761         float quad_strip_emboss[WIDGET_SIZE_MAX * 2][2]; /* only for emboss */
00762 
00763         const unsigned char tcol[4] = {wcol->outline[0],
00764                                        wcol->outline[1],
00765                                        wcol->outline[2],
00766                                        UCHAR_MAX / WIDGET_AA_JITTER};
00767 
00768         widget_verts_to_quad_strip(wtb, wtb->totvert, quad_strip);
00769 
00770         if (wtb->emboss) {
00771             widget_verts_to_quad_strip_open(wtb, wtb->halfwayvert, quad_strip_emboss);
00772         }
00773 
00774         glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00775 
00776         for (j = 0; j < WIDGET_AA_JITTER; j++) {
00777             glTranslatef(1.0f * jit[j][0], 1.0f * jit[j][1], 0.0f);
00778             
00779             /* outline */
00780             glColor4ubv(tcol);
00781 
00782             glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, quad_strip);
00783             glDrawArrays(GL_QUAD_STRIP, 0, wtb->totvert * 2 + 2);
00784         
00785             /* emboss bottom shadow */
00786             if (wtb->emboss) {
00787                 glColor4f(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 0.02f);
00788 
00789                 glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, quad_strip_emboss);
00790                 glDrawArrays(GL_QUAD_STRIP, 0, wtb->halfwayvert * 2);
00791             }
00792             
00793             glTranslatef(-1.0f * jit[j][0], -1.0f * jit[j][1], 0.0f);
00794         }
00795 
00796         glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00797     }
00798     
00799     /* decoration */
00800     if (wtb->tria1.tot || wtb->tria2.tot) {
00801         const unsigned char tcol[4] = {wcol->item[0],
00802                                        wcol->item[1],
00803                                        wcol->item[2],
00804                                        (unsigned char)((float)wcol->item[3] / WIDGET_AA_JITTER)};
00805         /* for each AA step */
00806         for (j = 0; j < WIDGET_AA_JITTER; j++) {
00807             glTranslatef(1.0f * jit[j][0], 1.0f * jit[j][1], 0.0f);
00808 
00809             if (wtb->tria1.tot) {
00810                 glColor4ubv(tcol);
00811                 widget_trias_draw(&wtb->tria1);
00812             }
00813             if (wtb->tria2.tot) {
00814                 glColor4ubv(tcol);
00815                 widget_trias_draw(&wtb->tria2);
00816             }
00817         
00818             glTranslatef(-1.0f * jit[j][0], -1.0f * jit[j][1], 0.0f);
00819         }
00820     }
00821 
00822     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00823     
00824 }
00825 
00826 /* *********************** text/icon ************************************** */
00827 
00828 #define PREVIEW_PAD 4
00829 
00830 static void widget_draw_preview(BIFIconID icon, float UNUSED(alpha), rcti *rect)
00831 {
00832     int w, h, size;
00833 
00834     if (icon == ICON_NONE)
00835         return;
00836 
00837     w = rect->xmax - rect->xmin;
00838     h = rect->ymax - rect->ymin;
00839     size = MIN2(w, h);
00840     size -= PREVIEW_PAD * 2;  /* padding */
00841 
00842     if (size > 0) {
00843         int x = rect->xmin + w / 2 - size / 2;
00844         int y = rect->ymin + h / 2 - size / 2;
00845 
00846         UI_icon_draw_preview_aspect_size(x, y, icon, 1.0f, size);
00847     }
00848 }
00849 
00850 
00851 static int ui_but_draw_menu_icon(uiBut *but)
00852 {
00853     return (but->flag & UI_ICON_SUBMENU) && (but->dt == UI_EMBOSSP);
00854 }
00855 
00856 /* icons have been standardized... and this call draws in untransformed coordinates */
00857 
00858 static void widget_draw_icon(uiBut *but, BIFIconID icon, float alpha, rcti *rect)
00859 {
00860     int xs = 0, ys = 0;
00861     float aspect, height;
00862     
00863     if (but->flag & UI_ICON_PREVIEW) {
00864         widget_draw_preview(icon, alpha, rect);
00865         return;
00866     }
00867     
00868     /* this icon doesn't need draw... */
00869     if (icon == ICON_BLANK1 && (but->flag & UI_ICON_SUBMENU) == 0) return;
00870     
00871     /* we need aspect from block, for menus... these buttons are scaled in uiPositionBlock() */
00872     aspect = but->block->aspect;
00873     if (aspect != but->aspect) {
00874         /* prevent scaling up icon in pupmenu */
00875         if (aspect < 1.0f) {            
00876             height = UI_DPI_ICON_SIZE;
00877             aspect = 1.0f;
00878             
00879         }
00880         else 
00881             height = UI_DPI_ICON_SIZE / aspect;
00882     }
00883     else
00884         height = UI_DPI_ICON_SIZE;
00885     
00886     /* calculate blend color */
00887     if (ELEM4(but->type, TOG, ROW, TOGN, LISTROW)) {
00888         if (but->flag & UI_SELECT) ;
00889         else if (but->flag & UI_ACTIVE) ;
00890         else alpha = 0.5f;
00891     }
00892     
00893     /* extra feature allows more alpha blending */
00894     if (but->type == LABEL && but->a1 == 1.0f) alpha *= but->a2;
00895     
00896     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00897     
00898     if (icon && icon != ICON_BLANK1) {
00899         if (but->flag & UI_ICON_LEFT) {
00900             if (but->type == BUT_TOGDUAL) {
00901                 if (but->drawstr[0]) {
00902                     xs = rect->xmin - 1;
00903                 }
00904                 else {
00905                     xs = (rect->xmin + rect->xmax - height) / 2;
00906                 }
00907             }
00908             else if (but->block->flag & UI_BLOCK_LOOP) {
00909                 if (but->type == SEARCH_MENU)
00910                     xs = rect->xmin + 4;
00911                 else
00912                     xs = rect->xmin + 1;
00913             }
00914             else if ((but->type == ICONROW) || (but->type == ICONTEXTROW)) {
00915                 xs = rect->xmin + 3;
00916             }
00917             else {
00918                 xs = rect->xmin + 4;
00919             }
00920             ys = (rect->ymin + rect->ymax - height) / 2;
00921         }
00922         else {
00923             xs = (rect->xmin + rect->xmax - height) / 2;
00924             ys = (rect->ymin + rect->ymax - height) / 2;
00925         }
00926         
00927         /* to indicate draggable */
00928         if (but->dragpoin && (but->flag & UI_ACTIVE)) {
00929             float rgb[3] = {1.25f, 1.25f, 1.25f};
00930             UI_icon_draw_aspect_color(xs, ys, icon, aspect, rgb);
00931         }
00932         else
00933             UI_icon_draw_aspect(xs, ys, icon, aspect, alpha);
00934     }
00935 
00936     if (ui_but_draw_menu_icon(but)) {
00937         xs = rect->xmax - UI_DPI_ICON_SIZE - 1;
00938         ys = (rect->ymin + rect->ymax - height) / 2;
00939         
00940         UI_icon_draw_aspect(xs, ys, ICON_RIGHTARROW_THIN, aspect, alpha);
00941     }
00942     
00943     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00944 }
00945 
00946 static void ui_text_clip_give_prev_off(uiBut *but)
00947 {
00948     char *prev_utf8 = BLI_str_find_prev_char_utf8(but->drawstr, but->drawstr + but->ofs);
00949     int bytes = but->drawstr + but->ofs - prev_utf8;
00950 
00951     but->ofs -= bytes;
00952 }
00953 
00954 static void ui_text_clip_give_next_off(uiBut *but)
00955 {
00956     char *next_utf8 = BLI_str_find_next_char_utf8(but->drawstr + but->ofs, NULL);
00957     int bytes = next_utf8 - (but->drawstr + but->ofs);
00958 
00959     but->ofs += bytes;
00960 }
00961 
00962 /* sets but->ofs to make sure text is correctly visible */
00963 static void ui_text_leftclip(uiFontStyle *fstyle, uiBut *but, rcti *rect)
00964 {
00965     int border = (but->flag & UI_BUT_ALIGN_RIGHT) ? 8 : 10;
00966     int okwidth = rect->xmax - rect->xmin - border;
00967     
00968     if (but->flag & UI_HAS_ICON) okwidth -= UI_DPI_ICON_SIZE;
00969     
00970     /* need to set this first */
00971     uiStyleFontSet(fstyle);
00972     
00973     if (fstyle->kerning == 1) /* for BLF_width */
00974         BLF_enable(fstyle->uifont_id, BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT);
00975 
00976     /* if text editing we define ofs dynamically */
00977     if (but->editstr && but->pos >= 0) {
00978         if (but->ofs > but->pos)
00979             but->ofs = but->pos;
00980 
00981         if (BLF_width(fstyle->uifont_id, but->drawstr) <= okwidth)
00982             but->ofs = 0;
00983     }
00984     else but->ofs = 0;
00985     
00986     but->strwidth = BLF_width(fstyle->uifont_id, but->drawstr + but->ofs);
00987     
00988     while (but->strwidth > okwidth) {
00989         
00990         /* textbut exception, clip right when... */
00991         if (but->editstr && but->pos >= 0) {
00992             float width;
00993             char buf[UI_MAX_DRAW_STR];
00994             
00995             /* copy draw string */
00996             BLI_strncpy_utf8(buf, but->drawstr, sizeof(buf));
00997             /* string position of cursor */
00998             buf[but->pos] = 0;
00999             width = BLF_width(fstyle->uifont_id, buf + but->ofs);
01000             
01001             /* if cursor is at 20 pixels of right side button we clip left */
01002             if (width > okwidth - 20)
01003                 ui_text_clip_give_next_off(but);
01004             else {
01005                 int len, bytes;
01006                 /* shift string to the left */
01007                 if (width < 20 && but->ofs > 0)
01008                     ui_text_clip_give_prev_off(but);
01009                 len = strlen(but->drawstr);
01010                 bytes = BLI_str_utf8_size(BLI_str_find_prev_char_utf8(but->drawstr, but->drawstr + len));
01011                 but->drawstr[len - bytes] = 0;
01012             }
01013         }
01014         else
01015             ui_text_clip_give_next_off(but);
01016 
01017         but->strwidth = BLF_width(fstyle->uifont_id, but->drawstr + but->ofs);
01018         
01019         if (but->strwidth < 10) break;
01020     }
01021     
01022     if (fstyle->kerning == 1)
01023         BLF_disable(fstyle->uifont_id, BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT);
01024 }
01025 
01026 static void ui_text_label_rightclip(uiFontStyle *fstyle, uiBut *but, rcti *rect)
01027 {
01028     int border = (but->flag & UI_BUT_ALIGN_RIGHT) ? 8 : 10;
01029     int okwidth = rect->xmax - rect->xmin - border;
01030     char *cpoin = NULL;
01031     char *cpend = but->drawstr + strlen(but->drawstr);
01032     
01033     /* need to set this first */
01034     uiStyleFontSet(fstyle);
01035     
01036     if (fstyle->kerning == 1) /* for BLF_width */
01037         BLF_enable(fstyle->uifont_id, BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT);
01038     
01039     but->strwidth = BLF_width(fstyle->uifont_id, but->drawstr);
01040     but->ofs = 0;
01041     
01042     /* find the space after ':' separator */
01043     cpoin = strrchr(but->drawstr, ':');
01044     
01045     if (cpoin && (cpoin < cpend - 2)) {
01046         char *cp2 = cpoin;
01047         
01048         /* chop off the leading text, starting from the right */
01049         while (but->strwidth > okwidth && cp2 > but->drawstr) {
01050             int bytes = BLI_str_utf8_size(cp2);
01051             if (bytes < 0)
01052                 bytes = 1;
01053 
01054             /* shift the text after and including cp2 back by 1 char, +1 to include null terminator */
01055             memmove(cp2 - bytes, cp2, strlen(cp2) + 1);
01056             cp2 -= bytes;
01057             
01058             but->strwidth = BLF_width(fstyle->uifont_id, but->drawstr + but->ofs);
01059             if (but->strwidth < 10) break;
01060         }
01061     
01062     
01063         /* after the leading text is gone, chop off the : and following space, with ofs */
01064         while ((but->strwidth > okwidth) && (but->ofs < 2))
01065         {
01066             ui_text_clip_give_next_off(but);
01067             but->strwidth = BLF_width(fstyle->uifont_id, but->drawstr + but->ofs);
01068             if (but->strwidth < 10) break;
01069         }
01070         
01071     }
01072 
01073     /* once the label's gone, chop off the least significant digits */
01074     while (but->strwidth > okwidth) {
01075         int len = strlen(but->drawstr);
01076         int bytes = BLI_str_utf8_size(BLI_str_find_prev_char_utf8(but->drawstr, but->drawstr + len));
01077         if (bytes < 0)
01078             bytes = 1;
01079 
01080         but->drawstr[len - bytes] = 0;
01081         
01082         but->strwidth = BLF_width(fstyle->uifont_id, but->drawstr + but->ofs);
01083         if (but->strwidth < 10) break;
01084     }
01085     
01086     if (fstyle->kerning == 1)
01087         BLF_disable(fstyle->uifont_id, BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT);
01088 }
01089 
01090 
01091 static void widget_draw_text(uiFontStyle *fstyle, uiWidgetColors *wcol, uiBut *but, rcti *rect)
01092 {
01093 //  int transopts;
01094     char *cpoin = NULL;
01095     
01096     /* for underline drawing */
01097     float font_xofs, font_yofs;
01098 
01099     uiStyleFontSet(fstyle);
01100     
01101     if (but->editstr || (but->flag & UI_TEXT_LEFT))
01102         fstyle->align = UI_STYLE_TEXT_LEFT;
01103     else
01104         fstyle->align = UI_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER;
01105     
01106     if (fstyle->kerning == 1) /* for BLF_width */
01107         BLF_enable(fstyle->uifont_id, BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT);
01108     
01109     /* text button selection and cursor */
01110     if (but->editstr && but->pos != -1) {
01111         short t = 0, pos = 0, ch;
01112         short selsta_tmp, selend_tmp, selsta_draw, selwidth_draw;
01113 
01114         if ((but->selend - but->selsta) > 0) {
01115             /* text button selection */
01116             selsta_tmp = but->selsta;
01117             selend_tmp = but->selend;
01118             
01119             if (but->drawstr[0] != 0) {
01120 
01121                 if (but->selsta >= but->ofs) {
01122                     ch = but->drawstr[selsta_tmp];
01123                     but->drawstr[selsta_tmp] = 0;
01124                     
01125                     selsta_draw = BLF_width(fstyle->uifont_id, but->drawstr + but->ofs);
01126                     
01127                     but->drawstr[selsta_tmp] = ch;
01128                 }
01129                 else {
01130                     selsta_draw = 0;
01131                 }
01132                 
01133                 ch = but->drawstr[selend_tmp];
01134                 but->drawstr[selend_tmp] = 0;
01135                 
01136                 selwidth_draw = BLF_width(fstyle->uifont_id, but->drawstr + but->ofs);
01137                 
01138                 but->drawstr[selend_tmp] = ch;
01139 
01140                 glColor3ubv((unsigned char *)wcol->item);
01141                 glRects(rect->xmin + selsta_draw, rect->ymin + 2, rect->xmin + selwidth_draw, rect->ymax - 2);
01142             }
01143         }
01144         else {
01145             /* text cursor */
01146             pos = but->pos;
01147             if (pos >= but->ofs) {
01148                 if (but->drawstr[0] != 0) {
01149                     ch = but->drawstr[pos];
01150                     but->drawstr[pos] = 0;
01151                     
01152                     t = BLF_width(fstyle->uifont_id, but->drawstr + but->ofs) / but->aspect;
01153                     
01154                     but->drawstr[pos] = ch;
01155                 }
01156 
01157                 glColor3f(0.20, 0.6, 0.9);
01158                 glRects(rect->xmin + t, rect->ymin + 2, rect->xmin + t + 2, rect->ymax - 2);
01159             }
01160         }
01161     }
01162     
01163     if (fstyle->kerning == 1)
01164         BLF_disable(fstyle->uifont_id, BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT);
01165     
01166     //  ui_rasterpos_safe(x, y, but->aspect);
01167 //  if (but->type==IDPOIN) transopts= 0;    // no translation, of course!
01168 //  else transopts= ui_translate_buttons();
01169     
01170     /* cut string in 2 parts - only for menu entries */
01171     if ((but->block->flag & UI_BLOCK_LOOP)) {
01172         if (ELEM5(but->type, SLI, NUM, TEX, NUMSLI, NUMABS) == 0) {
01173             cpoin = strchr(but->drawstr, '|');
01174             if (cpoin) *cpoin = 0;
01175         }
01176     }
01177     
01178     glColor3ubv((unsigned char *)wcol->text);
01179 
01180     uiStyleFontDrawExt(fstyle, rect, but->drawstr + but->ofs, &font_xofs, &font_yofs);
01181 
01182     if (but->menu_key != '\0') {
01183         char fixedbuf[128];
01184         char *str;
01185 
01186         BLI_strncpy(fixedbuf, but->drawstr + but->ofs, sizeof(fixedbuf));
01187 
01188         str = strchr(fixedbuf, but->menu_key - 32); /* upper case */
01189         if (str == NULL)
01190             str = strchr(fixedbuf, but->menu_key);
01191 
01192         if (str) {
01193             int ul_index = -1;
01194             float ul_advance;
01195 
01196             ul_index = (int)(str - fixedbuf);
01197 
01198             if (fstyle->kerning == 1) {
01199                 BLF_enable(fstyle->uifont_id, BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT);
01200             }
01201 
01202             fixedbuf[ul_index] = '\0';
01203             ul_advance = BLF_width(fstyle->uifont_id, fixedbuf);
01204 
01205             BLF_position(fstyle->uifont_id, rect->xmin + font_xofs + ul_advance, rect->ymin + font_yofs, 0.0f);
01206             BLF_draw(fstyle->uifont_id, "_", 2);
01207 
01208             if (fstyle->kerning == 1) {
01209                 BLF_disable(fstyle->uifont_id, BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT);
01210             }
01211         }
01212     }
01213 
01214     /* part text right aligned */
01215     if (cpoin) {
01216         fstyle->align = UI_STYLE_TEXT_RIGHT;
01217         rect->xmax -= ui_but_draw_menu_icon(but) ? UI_DPI_ICON_SIZE : 5;
01218         uiStyleFontDraw(fstyle, rect, cpoin + 1);
01219         *cpoin = '|';
01220     }
01221 }
01222 
01223 /* draws text and icons for buttons */
01224 static void widget_draw_text_icon(uiFontStyle *fstyle, uiWidgetColors *wcol, uiBut *but, rcti *rect)
01225 {
01226     
01227     if (but == NULL) return;
01228 
01229     /* clip but->drawstr to fit in available space */
01230     if (but->editstr && but->pos >= 0) {
01231         ui_text_leftclip(fstyle, but, rect);
01232     }
01233     else if (ELEM4(but->type, NUM, NUMABS, NUMSLI, SLI)) {
01234         ui_text_label_rightclip(fstyle, but, rect);
01235     }
01236     else if (ELEM(but->type, TEX, SEARCH_MENU)) {
01237         ui_text_leftclip(fstyle, but, rect);
01238     }
01239     else if ((but->block->flag & UI_BLOCK_LOOP) && (but->type == BUT)) {
01240         ui_text_leftclip(fstyle, but, rect);
01241     }
01242     else but->ofs = 0;
01243     
01244     /* check for button text label */
01245     if (but->type == ICONTEXTROW) {
01246         widget_draw_icon(but, (BIFIconID) (but->icon + but->iconadd), 1.0f, rect);
01247     }
01248     else {
01249                 
01250         if (but->type == BUT_TOGDUAL) {
01251             int dualset = 0;
01252             if (but->pointype == SHO)
01253                 dualset = BTST(*(((short *)but->poin) + 1), but->bitnr);
01254             else if (but->pointype == INT)
01255                 dualset = BTST(*(((int *)but->poin) + 1), but->bitnr);
01256             
01257             widget_draw_icon(but, ICON_DOT, dualset ? 1.0f : 0.25f, rect);
01258         }
01259         else if (but->type == MENU && (but->flag & UI_BUT_NODE_LINK)) {
01260             int tmp = rect->xmin;
01261             rect->xmin = rect->xmax - (rect->ymax - rect->ymin) - 1;
01262             widget_draw_icon(but, ICON_LAYER_USED, 1.0f, rect);
01263             rect->xmin = tmp;
01264         }
01265         
01266         /* If there's an icon too (made with uiDefIconTextBut) then draw the icon
01267          * and offset the text label to accommodate it */
01268         
01269         if (but->flag & UI_HAS_ICON) {
01270             widget_draw_icon(but, but->icon + but->iconadd, 1.0f, rect);
01271             
01272             rect->xmin += (int)((float)UI_icon_get_width(but->icon + but->iconadd) * UI_DPI_ICON_FAC);
01273             
01274             if (but->editstr || (but->flag & UI_TEXT_LEFT)) 
01275                 rect->xmin += 5;
01276         }
01277         else if ((but->flag & UI_TEXT_LEFT)) 
01278             rect->xmin += 5;
01279         
01280         /* always draw text for textbutton cursor */
01281         widget_draw_text(fstyle, wcol, but, rect);
01282 
01283     }
01284 }
