01564 /* called for theme init (new theme) and versions */
01565 void ui_widget_color_init(ThemeUI *tui)
01566 {
01567     tui->wcol_regular = wcol_regular;
01568     tui->wcol_tool = wcol_tool;
01569     tui->wcol_text = wcol_text;
01570     tui->wcol_radio = wcol_radio;
01571     tui->wcol_option = wcol_option;
01572     tui->wcol_toggle = wcol_toggle;
01573     tui->wcol_num = wcol_num;
01574     tui->wcol_numslider = wcol_numslider;
01575     tui->wcol_menu = wcol_menu;
01576     tui->wcol_pulldown = wcol_pulldown;
01577     tui->wcol_menu_back = wcol_menu_back;
01578     tui->wcol_tooltip = wcol_tooltip;
01579     tui->wcol_menu_item = wcol_menu_item;
01580     tui->wcol_box = wcol_box;
01581     tui->wcol_scroll = wcol_scroll;
01582     tui->wcol_list_item = wcol_list_item;
01583     tui->wcol_progress = wcol_progress;
01584 
01585     tui->wcol_state = wcol_state_colors;
01586 }
01587 
01588 /* ************ button callbacks, state ***************** */
01589 
01590 static void widget_state_blend(char cp[3], const char cpstate[3], const float fac)
01591 {
01592     if (fac != 0.0f) {
01593         cp[0] = (int)((1.0f - fac) * cp[0] + fac * cpstate[0]);
01594         cp[1] = (int)((1.0f - fac) * cp[1] + fac * cpstate[1]);
01595         cp[2] = (int)((1.0f - fac) * cp[2] + fac * cpstate[2]);
01596     }
01597 }
01598 
01599 /* copy colors from theme, and set changes in it based on state */
01600 static void widget_state(uiWidgetType *wt, int state)
01601 {
01602     uiWidgetStateColors *wcol_state = wt->wcol_state;
01603 
01604     wt->wcol = *(wt->wcol_theme);
01605     
01606     if (state & UI_SELECT) {
01607         copy_v4_v4_char(wt->wcol.inner, wt->wcol.inner_sel);
01608 
01609         if (state & UI_BUT_ANIMATED_KEY)
01610             widget_state_blend(wt->wcol.inner, wcol_state->inner_key_sel, wcol_state->blend);
01611         else if (state & UI_BUT_ANIMATED)
01612             widget_state_blend(wt->wcol.inner, wcol_state->inner_anim_sel, wcol_state->blend);
01613         else if (state & UI_BUT_DRIVEN)
01614             widget_state_blend(wt->wcol.inner, wcol_state->inner_driven_sel, wcol_state->blend);
01615 
01616         copy_v3_v3_char(wt->wcol.text, wt->wcol.text_sel);
01617         
01618         if (state & UI_SELECT)
01619             SWAP(short, wt->wcol.shadetop, wt->wcol.shadedown);
01620     }
01621     else {
01622         if (state & UI_BUT_ANIMATED_KEY)
01623             widget_state_blend(wt->wcol.inner, wcol_state->inner_key, wcol_state->blend);
01624         else if (state & UI_BUT_ANIMATED)
01625             widget_state_blend(wt->wcol.inner, wcol_state->inner_anim, wcol_state->blend);
01626         else if (state & UI_BUT_DRIVEN)
01627             widget_state_blend(wt->wcol.inner, wcol_state->inner_driven, wcol_state->blend);
01628 
01629         if (state & UI_ACTIVE) { /* mouse over? */
01630             wt->wcol.inner[0] = wt->wcol.inner[0] >= 240 ? 255 : wt->wcol.inner[0] + 15;
01631             wt->wcol.inner[1] = wt->wcol.inner[1] >= 240 ? 255 : wt->wcol.inner[1] + 15;
01632             wt->wcol.inner[2] = wt->wcol.inner[2] >= 240 ? 255 : wt->wcol.inner[2] + 15;
01633         }
01634     }
01635 
01636     if (state & UI_BUT_REDALERT) {
01637         char red[4] = {255, 0, 0};
01638         widget_state_blend(wt->wcol.inner, red, 0.4f);
01639     }
01640     if (state & UI_BUT_NODE_ACTIVE) {
01641         char blue[4] = {86, 128, 194};
01642         widget_state_blend(wt->wcol.inner, blue, 0.3f);
01643     }
01644 }
01645 
01646 /* sliders use special hack which sets 'item' as inner when drawing filling */
01647 static void widget_state_numslider(uiWidgetType *wt, int state)
01648 {
01649     uiWidgetStateColors *wcol_state = wt->wcol_state;
01650     float blend = wcol_state->blend - 0.2f; // XXX special tweak to make sure that bar will still be visible
01651 
01652     /* call this for option button */
01653     widget_state(wt, state);
01654     
01655     /* now, set the inner-part so that it reflects state settings too */
01656     // TODO: maybe we should have separate settings for the blending colors used for this case?
01657     if (state & UI_SELECT) {
01658         
01659         if (state & UI_BUT_ANIMATED_KEY)
01660             widget_state_blend(wt->wcol.item, wcol_state->inner_key_sel, blend);
01661         else if (state & UI_BUT_ANIMATED)
01662             widget_state_blend(wt->wcol.item, wcol_state->inner_anim_sel, blend);
01663         else if (state & UI_BUT_DRIVEN)
01664             widget_state_blend(wt->wcol.item, wcol_state->inner_driven_sel, blend);
01665         
01666         if (state & UI_SELECT)
01667             SWAP(short, wt->wcol.shadetop, wt->wcol.shadedown);
01668     }
01669     else {
01670         if (state & UI_BUT_ANIMATED_KEY)
01671             widget_state_blend(wt->wcol.item, wcol_state->inner_key, blend);
01672         else if (state & UI_BUT_ANIMATED)
01673             widget_state_blend(wt->wcol.item, wcol_state->inner_anim, blend);
01674         else if (state & UI_BUT_DRIVEN)
01675             widget_state_blend(wt->wcol.item, wcol_state->inner_driven, blend);
01676     }
01677 }
01678 
01679 /* labels use theme colors for text */
01680 static void widget_state_label(uiWidgetType *wt, int state)
01681 {
01682     /* call this for option button */
01683     widget_state(wt, state);
01684 
01685     if (state & UI_SELECT)
01686         UI_GetThemeColor4ubv(TH_TEXT_HI, (unsigned char *)wt->wcol.text);
01687     else
01688         UI_GetThemeColor4ubv(TH_TEXT, (unsigned char *)wt->wcol.text);
01689     
01690 }
01691 
01692 /* labels use theme colors for text */
01693 static void widget_state_option_menu(uiWidgetType *wt, int state)
01694 {
01695     
01696     /* call this for option button */
01697     widget_state(wt, state);
01698     
01699     /* if not selected we get theme from menu back */
01700     if (state & UI_SELECT)
01701         UI_GetThemeColor4ubv(TH_TEXT_HI, (unsigned char *)wt->wcol.text);
01702     else {
01703         bTheme *btheme = UI_GetTheme(); /* XXX */
01704 
01705         copy_v3_v3_char(wt->wcol.text, btheme->tui.wcol_menu_back.text);
01706     }
01707 }
01708 
01709 
01710 static void widget_state_nothing(uiWidgetType *wt, int UNUSED(state))
01711 {
01712     wt->wcol = *(wt->wcol_theme);
01713 }   
01714 
01715 /* special case, button that calls pulldown */
01716 static void widget_state_pulldown(uiWidgetType *wt, int state)
01717 {
01718     wt->wcol = *(wt->wcol_theme);
01719     
01720     copy_v4_v4_char(wt->wcol.inner, wt->wcol.inner_sel);
01721     copy_v3_v3_char(wt->wcol.outline, wt->wcol.inner);
01722 
01723     if (state & UI_ACTIVE)
01724         copy_v3_v3_char(wt->wcol.text, wt->wcol.text_sel);
01725 }
01726 
01727 /* special case, menu items */
01728 static void widget_state_menu_item(uiWidgetType *wt, int state)
01729 {
01730     wt->wcol = *(wt->wcol_theme);
01731     
01732     if (state & (UI_BUT_DISABLED | UI_BUT_INACTIVE)) {
01733         wt->wcol.text[0] = 0.5f * (wt->wcol.text[0] + wt->wcol.text_sel[0]);
01734         wt->wcol.text[1] = 0.5f * (wt->wcol.text[1] + wt->wcol.text_sel[1]);
01735         wt->wcol.text[2] = 0.5f * (wt->wcol.text[2] + wt->wcol.text_sel[2]);
01736     }
01737     else if (state & UI_ACTIVE) {
01738         copy_v4_v4_char(wt->wcol.inner, wt->wcol.inner_sel);
01739         copy_v3_v3_char(wt->wcol.text, wt->wcol.text_sel);
01740     }
01741 }
01742 
01743 
01744 /* ************ menu backdrop ************************* */
01745 
01746 /* outside of rect, rad to left/bottom/right */
01747 static void widget_softshadow(rcti *rect, int roundboxalign, float radin, float radout)
01748 {
01749     uiWidgetBase wtb;
01750     rcti rect1 = *rect;
01751     float alpha, alphastep;
01752     int step, totvert;
01753     float quad_strip[WIDGET_SIZE_MAX * 2][2];
01754     
01755     /* prevent tooltips to not show round shadow */
01756     if (2.0f * radout > 0.2f * (rect1.ymax - rect1.ymin) )
01757         rect1.ymax -= 0.2f * (rect1.ymax - rect1.ymin);
01758     else
01759         rect1.ymax -= 2.0f * radout;
01760     
01761     /* inner part */
01762     totvert = round_box_shadow_edges(wtb.inner_v, &rect1, radin, roundboxalign & (UI_CNR_BOTTOM_RIGHT | UI_CNR_BOTTOM_LEFT), 0.0f);
01763 
01764     /* inverse linear shadow alpha */
01765     alpha = 0.15;
01766     alphastep = 0.67;
01767     
01768     glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
01769 
01770     for (step = 1; step <= radout; step++, alpha *= alphastep) {
01771         round_box_shadow_edges(wtb.outer_v, &rect1, radin, UI_CNR_ALL, (float)step);
01772         
01773         glColor4f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, alpha);
01774 
01775         widget_verts_to_quad_strip_open(&wtb, totvert, quad_strip);
01776 
01777         glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, quad_strip);
01778         glDrawArrays(GL_QUAD_STRIP, 0, totvert * 2);
01779     }
01780 
01781     glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
01782 }
01783 
01784 static void widget_menu_back(uiWidgetColors *wcol, rcti *rect, int flag, int direction)
01785 {
01786     uiWidgetBase wtb;
01787     int roundboxalign = UI_CNR_ALL;
01788     
01789     widget_init(&wtb);
01790     
01791     /* menu is 2nd level or deeper */
01792     if (flag & UI_BLOCK_POPUP) {
01793         //rect->ymin -= 4.0;
01794         //rect->ymax += 4.0;
01795     }
01796     else if (direction == UI_DOWN) {
01797         roundboxalign = (UI_CNR_BOTTOM_RIGHT | UI_CNR_BOTTOM_LEFT);
01798         rect->ymin -= 4.0;
01799     } 
01800     else if (direction == UI_TOP) {
01801         roundboxalign = UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT | UI_CNR_TOP_RIGHT;
01802         rect->ymax += 4.0;
01803     }
01804     
01805     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
01806     widget_softshadow(rect, roundboxalign, 5.0f, 8.0f);
01807     
01808     round_box_edges(&wtb, roundboxalign, rect, 5.0f);
01809     wtb.emboss = 0;
01810     widgetbase_draw(&wtb, wcol);
01811     
01812     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
01813 }
01814 
01815 
01816 static void ui_hsv_cursor(float x, float y)
01817 {
01818     
01819     glPushMatrix();
01820     glTranslatef(x, y, 0.0f);
01821     
01822     glColor3f(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
01823     glutil_draw_filled_arc(0.0f, M_PI * 2.0, 3.0f, 8);
01824     
01825     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
01826     glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
01827     glColor3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
01828     glutil_draw_lined_arc(0.0f, M_PI * 2.0, 3.0f, 12);
01829     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
01830     glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
01831     
01832     glPopMatrix();
01833     
01834 }
01835 
01836 void ui_hsvcircle_vals_from_pos(float *valrad, float *valdist, rcti *rect, float mx, float my)
01837 {
01838     /* duplication of code... well, simple is better now */
01839     float centx = (float)(rect->xmin + rect->xmax) / 2;
01840     float centy = (float)(rect->ymin + rect->ymax) / 2;
01841     float radius, dist;
01842     
01843     if (rect->xmax - rect->xmin > rect->ymax - rect->ymin)
01844         radius = (float)(rect->ymax - rect->ymin) / 2;
01845     else
01846         radius = (float)(rect->xmax - rect->xmin) / 2;
01847 
01848     mx -= centx;
01849     my -= centy;
01850     dist = sqrt(mx * mx + my * my);
01851     if (dist < radius)
01852         *valdist = dist / radius;
01853     else
01854         *valdist = 1.0f;
01855     
01856     *valrad = atan2f(mx, my) / (2.0f * (float)M_PI) + 0.5f;
01857 }
01858 
01859 static void ui_draw_but_HSVCIRCLE(uiBut *but, uiWidgetColors *wcol, rcti *rect)
01860 {
01861     /* gouraud triangle fan */
01862     float radstep, ang = 0.0f;
01863     float centx, centy, radius, cursor_radius;
01864     float rgb[3], hsvo[3], hsv[3], col[3], colcent[3];
01865     int a, tot = 32;
01866     int color_profile = but->block->color_profile;
01867     
01868     if (but->rnaprop && RNA_property_subtype(but->rnaprop) == PROP_COLOR_GAMMA)
01869         color_profile = BLI_PR_NONE;
01870     
01871     radstep = 2.0f * (float)M_PI / (float)tot;
01872     centx = (float)(rect->xmin + rect->xmax) / 2;
01873     centy = (float)(rect->ymin + rect->ymax) / 2;
01874     
01875     if (rect->xmax - rect->xmin > rect->ymax - rect->ymin)
01876         radius = (float)(rect->ymax - rect->ymin) / 2;
01877     else
01878         radius = (float)(rect->xmax - rect->xmin) / 2;
01879     
01880     /* color */
01881     ui_get_but_vectorf(but, rgb);
01882     copy_v3_v3(hsv, ui_block_hsv_get(but->block));
01883     rgb_to_hsv_compat(rgb[0], rgb[1], rgb[2], hsv, hsv + 1, hsv + 2);
01884     copy_v3_v3(hsvo, hsv);
01885     
01886     /* exception: if 'lock' is set
01887      * lock the value of the color wheel to 1.
01888      * Useful for color correction tools where you're only interested in hue. */
01889     if (but->flag & UI_BUT_COLOR_LOCK)
01890         hsv[2] = 1.f;
01891     else if (color_profile)
01892         hsv[2] = linearrgb_to_srgb(hsv[2]);
01893     
01894     hsv_to_rgb(0.f, 0.f, hsv[2], colcent, colcent + 1, colcent + 2);
01895     
01896     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
01897 
01898     glBegin(GL_TRIANGLE_FAN);
01899     glColor3fv(colcent);
01900     glVertex2f(centx, centy);
01901     
01902     for (a = 0; a <= tot; a++, ang += radstep) {
01903         float si = sin(ang);
01904         float co = cos(ang);
01905         
01906         ui_hsvcircle_vals_from_pos(hsv, hsv + 1, rect, centx + co * radius, centy + si * radius);
01907         CLAMP(hsv[2], 0.0f, 1.0f); /* for display only */
01908 
01909         hsv_to_rgb(hsv[0], hsv[1], hsv[2], col, col + 1, col + 2);
01910         glColor3fv(col);
01911         glVertex2f(centx + co * radius, centy + si * radius);
01912     }
01913     glEnd();
01914     
01915     glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
01916     
01917     /* fully rounded outline */
01918     glPushMatrix();
01919     glTranslatef(centx, centy, 0.0f);
01920     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
01921     glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
01922     glColor3ubv((unsigned char *)wcol->outline);
01923     glutil_draw_lined_arc(0.0f, M_PI * 2.0, radius, tot + 1);
01924     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
01925     glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
01926     glPopMatrix();
01927 
01928     /* cursor */
01929     ang = 2.0f * (float)M_PI * hsvo[0] + 0.5f * (float)M_PI;
01930 
01931     if (but->flag & UI_BUT_COLOR_CUBIC)
01932         cursor_radius = (1.0f - powf(1.0f - hsvo[1], 3.0f));
01933     else
01934         cursor_radius = hsvo[1];
01935 
01936     radius = CLAMPIS(cursor_radius, 0.0f, 1.0f) * radius;
01937     ui_hsv_cursor(centx + cosf(-ang) * radius, centy + sinf(-ang) * radius);
01938 }
01939 
01940 /* ************ custom buttons, old stuff ************** */
01941 
01942 /* draws in resolution of 20x4 colors */
01943 void ui_draw_gradient(rcti *rect, const float hsv[3], int type, float alpha)
01944 {
01945     int a;
01946     float h = hsv[0], s = hsv[1], v = hsv[2];
01947     float dx, dy, sx1, sx2, sy;
01948     float col0[4][3];   // left half, rect bottom to top
01949     float col1[4][3];   // right half, rect bottom to top
01950 
01951     /* draw series of gouraud rects */
01952     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
01953     
01954     switch (type) {
01955         case UI_GRAD_SV:
01956             hsv_to_rgb(h, 0.0, 0.0,   &col1[0][0], &col1[0][1], &col1[0][2]);
01957             hsv_to_rgb(h, 0.333, 0.0, &col1[1][0], &col1[1][1], &col1[1][2]);
01958             hsv_to_rgb(h, 0.666, 0.0, &col1[2][0], &col1[2][1], &col1[2][2]);
01959             hsv_to_rgb(h, 1.0, 0.0,   &col1[3][0], &col1[3][1], &col1[3][2]);
01960             break;
01961         case UI_GRAD_HV:
01962             hsv_to_rgb(0.0, s, 0.0,   &col1[0][0], &col1[0][1], &col1[0][2]);
01963             hsv_to_rgb(0.0, s, 0.333, &col1[1][0], &col1[1][1], &col1[1][2]);
01964             hsv_to_rgb(0.0, s, 0.666, &col1[2][0], &col1[2][1], &col1[2][2]);
01965             hsv_to_rgb(0.0, s, 1.0,   &col1[3][0], &col1[3][1], &col1[3][2]);
01966             break;
01967         case UI_GRAD_HS:
01968             hsv_to_rgb(0.0, 0.0, v,   &col1[0][0], &col1[0][1], &col1[0][2]);
01969             hsv_to_rgb(0.0, 0.333, v, &col1[1][0], &col1[1][1], &col1[1][2]);
01970             hsv_to_rgb(0.0, 0.666, v, &col1[2][0], &col1[2][1], &col1[2][2]);
01971             hsv_to_rgb(0.0, 1.0, v,   &col1[3][0], &col1[3][1], &col1[3][2]);
01972             break;
01973         case UI_GRAD_H:
01974             hsv_to_rgb(0.0, 1.0, 1.0,   &col1[0][0], &col1[0][1], &col1[0][2]);
01975             copy_v3_v3(col1[1], col1[0]);
01976             copy_v3_v3(col1[2], col1[0]);
01977             copy_v3_v3(col1[3], col1[0]);
01978             break;
01979         case UI_GRAD_S:
01980             hsv_to_rgb(1.0, 0.0, 1.0,   &col1[1][0], &col1[1][1], &col1[1][2]);
01981             copy_v3_v3(col1[0], col1[1]);
01982             copy_v3_v3(col1[2], col1[1]);
01983             copy_v3_v3(col1[3], col1[1]);
01984             break;
01985         case UI_GRAD_V:
01986             hsv_to_rgb(1.0, 1.0, 0.0,   &col1[2][0], &col1[2][1], &col1[2][2]);
01987             copy_v3_v3(col1[0], col1[2]);
01988             copy_v3_v3(col1[1], col1[2]);
01989             copy_v3_v3(col1[3], col1[2]);
01990             break;
01991         default:
01992             assert(!"invalid 'type' argument");
01993             hsv_to_rgb(1.0, 1.0, 1.0,   &col1[2][0], &col1[2][1], &col1[2][2]);
01994             copy_v3_v3(col1[0], col1[2]);
01995             copy_v3_v3(col1[1], col1[2]);
01996             copy_v3_v3(col1[3], col1[2]);
01997     }
01998     
01999     /* old below */
02000     
02001     for (dx = 0.0f; dx < 1.0f; dx += 0.05f) {
02002         // previous color
02003         copy_v3_v3(col0[0], col1[0]);
02004         copy_v3_v3(col0[1], col1[1]);
02005         copy_v3_v3(col0[2], col1[2]);
02006         copy_v3_v3(col0[3], col1[3]);
02007         
02008         // new color
02009         switch (type) {
02010             case UI_GRAD_SV:
02011                 hsv_to_rgb(h, 0.0, dx,   &col1[0][0], &col1[0][1], &col1[0][2]);
02012                 hsv_to_rgb(h, 0.333, dx, &col1[1][0], &col1[1][1], &col1[1][2]);
02013                 hsv_to_rgb(h, 0.666, dx, &col1[2][0], &col1[2][1], &col1[2][2]);
02014                 hsv_to_rgb(h, 1.0, dx,   &col1[3][0], &col1[3][1], &col1[3][2]);
02015                 break;
02016             case UI_GRAD_HV:
02017                 hsv_to_rgb(dx, s, 0.0,   &col1[0][0], &col1[0][1], &col1[0][2]);
02018                 hsv_to_rgb(dx, s, 0.333, &col1[1][0], &col1[1][1], &col1[1][2]);
02019                 hsv_to_rgb(dx, s, 0.666, &col1[2][0], &col1[2][1], &col1[2][2]);
02020                 hsv_to_rgb(dx, s, 1.0,   &col1[3][0], &col1[3][1], &col1[3][2]);
02021                 break;
02022             case UI_GRAD_HS:
02023                 hsv_to_rgb(dx, 0.0, v,   &col1[0][0], &col1[0][1], &col1[0][2]);
02024                 hsv_to_rgb(dx, 0.333, v, &col1[1][0], &col1[1][1], &col1[1][2]);
02025                 hsv_to_rgb(dx, 0.666, v, &col1[2][0], &col1[2][1], &col1[2][2]);
02026                 hsv_to_rgb(dx, 1.0, v,   &col1[3][0], &col1[3][1], &col1[3][2]);
02027                 break;
02028             case UI_GRAD_H:
02029                 hsv_to_rgb(dx, 1.0, 1.0,   &col1[0][0], &col1[0][1], &col1[0][2]);
02030                 copy_v3_v3(col1[1], col1[0]);
02031                 copy_v3_v3(col1[2], col1[0]);
02032                 copy_v3_v3(col1[3], col1[0]);
02033                 break;
02034             case UI_GRAD_S:
02035                 hsv_to_rgb(h, dx, 1.0,   &col1[1][0], &col1[1][1], &col1[1][2]);
02036                 copy_v3_v3(col1[0], col1[1]);
02037                 copy_v3_v3(col1[2], col1[1]);
02038                 copy_v3_v3(col1[3], col1[1]);
02039                 break;
02040             case UI_GRAD_V:
02041                 hsv_to_rgb(h, 1.0, dx,   &col1[2][0], &col1[2][1], &col1[2][2]);
02042                 copy_v3_v3(col1[0], col1[2]);
02043                 copy_v3_v3(col1[1], col1[2]);
02044                 copy_v3_v3(col1[3], col1[2]);
02045                 break;
02046         }
02047         
02048         // rect
02049         sx1 = rect->xmin + dx * (rect->xmax - rect->xmin);
02050         sx2 = rect->xmin + (dx + 0.05f) * (rect->xmax - rect->xmin);
02051         sy = rect->ymin;
02052         dy = (rect->ymax - rect->ymin) / 3.0;
02053         
02054         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
02055         for (a = 0; a < 3; a++, sy += dy) {
02056             glColor4f(col0[a][0], col0[a][1], col0[a][2], alpha);
02057             glVertex2f(sx1, sy);
02058             
02059             glColor4f(col1[a][0], col1[a][1], col1[a][2], alpha);
02060             glVertex2f(sx2, sy);
02061 
02062             glColor4f(col1[a + 1][0], col1[a + 1][1], col1[a + 1][2], alpha);
02063             glVertex2f(sx2, sy + dy);
02064             
02065             glColor4f(col0[a + 1][0], col0[a + 1][1], col0[a + 1][2], alpha);
02066             glVertex2f(sx1, sy + dy);
02067         }
02068         glEnd();
02069     }
02070     
02071     glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
02072     
02073 }
02074 
02075 
02076 
02077 static void ui_draw_but_HSVCUBE(uiBut *but, rcti *rect)
02078 {
02079     float rgb[3], h, s, v;
02080     float x = 0.0f, y = 0.0f;
02081     float *hsv = ui_block_hsv_get(but->block);
02082     float hsvn[3];
02083     
02084     h = hsv[0];
02085     s = hsv[1];
02086     v = hsv[2];
02087     
02088     ui_get_but_vectorf(but, rgb);
02089     rgb_to_hsv_compat(rgb[0], rgb[1], rgb[2], &h, &s, &v);
02090 
02091     hsvn[0] = h;
02092     hsvn[1] = s;
02093     hsvn[2] = v;
02094     
02095     ui_draw_gradient(rect, hsvn, but->a1, 1.f);
02096     
02097     switch ((int)but->a1) {
02098         case UI_GRAD_SV:
02099             x = v; y = s; break;
02100         case UI_GRAD_HV:
02101             x = h; y = v; break;
02102         case UI_GRAD_HS:
02103             x = h; y = s; break;
02104         case UI_GRAD_H:
02105             x = h; y = 0.5; break;
02106         case UI_GRAD_S:
02107             x = s; y = 0.5; break;
02108         case UI_GRAD_V:
02109             x = v; y = 0.5; break;
02110     }
02111     
02112     /* cursor */
02113     x = rect->xmin + x * (rect->xmax - rect->xmin);
02114     y = rect->ymin + y * (rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
02115     CLAMP(x, rect->xmin + 3.0f, rect->xmax - 3.0f);
02116     CLAMP(y, rect->ymin + 3.0f, rect->ymax - 3.0f);
02117     
02118     ui_hsv_cursor(x, y);
02119     
02120     /* outline */
02121     glColor3ub(0,  0,  0);
02122     fdrawbox((rect->xmin), (rect->ymin), (rect->xmax), (rect->ymax));
02123 }
02124 
02125 /* vertical 'value' slider, using new widget code */
02126 static void ui_draw_but_HSV_v(uiBut *but, rcti *rect)
02127 {
02128     uiWidgetBase wtb;
02129     float rad = 0.5f * (rect->xmax - rect->xmin);
02130     float x, y;
02131     float rgb[3], hsv[3], v, range;
02132     int color_profile = but->block->color_profile;
02133     
02134     if (but->rnaprop && RNA_property_subtype(but->rnaprop) == PROP_COLOR_GAMMA)
02135         color_profile = BLI_PR_NONE;
02136 
02137     ui_get_but_vectorf(but, rgb);
02138     rgb_to_hsv(rgb[0], rgb[1], rgb[2], hsv, hsv + 1, hsv + 2);
02139     v = hsv[2];
02140     
02141     if (color_profile)
02142         v = linearrgb_to_srgb(v);
02143 
02144     /* map v from property range to [0,1] */
02145     range = but->softmax - but->softmin;
02146     v = (v - but->softmin) / range;
02147     
02148     widget_init(&wtb);
02149     
02150     /* fully rounded */
02151     round_box_edges(&wtb, UI_CNR_ALL, rect, rad);
02152     
02153     /* setup temp colors */
02154     wcol_tmp.outline[0] = wcol_tmp.outline[1] = wcol_tmp.outline[2] = 0;
02155     wcol_tmp.inner[0] = wcol_tmp.inner[1] = wcol_tmp.inner[2] = 128;
02156     wcol_tmp.shadetop = 127;
02157     wcol_tmp.shadedown = -128;
02158     wcol_tmp.shaded = 1;
02159     
02160     widgetbase_draw(&wtb, &wcol_tmp);
02161 
02162     /* cursor */
02163     x = rect->xmin + 0.5f * (rect->xmax - rect->xmin);
02164     y = rect->ymin + v * (rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
02165     CLAMP(y, rect->ymin + 3.0f, rect->ymax - 3.0f);
02166     
02167     ui_hsv_cursor(x, y);
02168     
02169 }
02170 
02171 
02172 /* ************ separator, for menus etc ***************** */
02173 static void ui_draw_separator(rcti *rect,  uiWidgetColors *wcol)
02174 {
02175     int y = rect->ymin + (rect->ymax - rect->ymin) / 2 - 1;
02176     unsigned char col[4];
02177     
02178     col[0] = wcol->text[0];
02179     col[1] = wcol->text[1];
02180     col[2] = wcol->text[2];
02181     col[3] = 7;
02182     
02183     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
02184     glColor4ubv(col);
02185     sdrawline(rect->xmin, y, rect->xmax, y);
02186     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
02187 }
02188 
02189 /* ************ button callbacks, draw ***************** */
02190 
02191 static void widget_numbut(uiWidgetColors *wcol, rcti *rect, int state, int roundboxalign)
02192 {
02193     uiWidgetBase wtb;
02194     float rad = 0.5f * (rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
02195     float textofs = rad * 0.75f;
02196 
02197     if (state & UI_SELECT)
02198         SWAP(short, wcol->shadetop, wcol->shadedown);
02199     
02200     widget_init(&wtb);
02201     
02202     /* fully rounded */
02203     round_box_edges(&wtb, roundboxalign, rect, rad);
02204     
02205     /* decoration */
02206     if (!(state & UI_TEXTINPUT)) {
02207         widget_num_tria(&wtb.tria1, rect, 0.6f, 'l');
02208         widget_num_tria(&wtb.tria2, rect, 0.6f, 'r');
02209     }
02210 
02211     widgetbase_draw(&wtb, wcol);
02212     
02213     /* text space */
02214     rect->xmin += textofs;
02215     rect->xmax -= textofs;
02216 }
02217 
02218 //static int ui_link_bezier_points(rcti *rect, float coord_array[][2], int resol)
02219 int ui_link_bezier_points(rcti *rect, float coord_array[][2], int resol)
02220 {
02221     float dist, vec[4][2];
02222 
02223     vec[0][0] = rect->xmin;
02224     vec[0][1] = rect->ymin;
02225     vec[3][0] = rect->xmax;
02226     vec[3][1] = rect->ymax;
02227     
02228     dist = 0.5f * ABS(vec[0][0] - vec[3][0]);
02229     
02230     vec[1][0] = vec[0][0] + dist;
02231     vec[1][1] = vec[0][1];
02232     
02233     vec[2][0] = vec[3][0] - dist;
02234     vec[2][1] = vec[3][1];
02235     
02236     forward_diff_bezier(vec[0][0], vec[1][0], vec[2][0], vec[3][0], coord_array[0], resol, sizeof(float) * 2);
02237     forward_diff_bezier(vec[0][1], vec[1][1], vec[2][1], vec[3][1], coord_array[0] + 1, resol, sizeof(float) * 2);
02238     
02239     return 1;
02240 }
02241 
02242 #define LINK_RESOL  24
02243 void ui_draw_link_bezier(rcti *rect)
02244 {
02245     float coord_array[LINK_RESOL + 1][2];
02246     
02247     if (ui_link_bezier_points(rect, coord_array, LINK_RESOL)) {
02248         /* we can reuse the dist variable here to increment the GL curve eval amount*/
02249         // const float dist= 1.0f/(float)LINK_RESOL; // UNUSED
02250 
02251         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
02252         glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
02253 
02254         glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
02255         glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, coord_array);
02256         glDrawArrays(GL_LINE_STRIP, 0, LINK_RESOL);
02257         glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
02258 
02259         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
02260         glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
02261 
02262     }
02263 }
02264 
02265 /* function in use for buttons and for view2d sliders */
02266 void uiWidgetScrollDraw(uiWidgetColors *wcol, rcti *rect, rcti *slider, int state)
02267 {
02268     uiWidgetBase wtb;
02269     float rad;
02270     int horizontal;
02271     short outline = 0;
02272 
02273     widget_init(&wtb);
02274 
02275     /* determine horizontal/vertical */
02276     horizontal = (rect->xmax - rect->xmin > rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
02277     
02278     if (horizontal)
02279         rad = 0.5f * (rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
02280     else
02281         rad = 0.5f * (rect->xmax - rect->xmin);
02282     
02283     wtb.shadedir = (horizontal) ? 1 : 0;
02284     
02285     /* draw back part, colors swapped and shading inverted */
02286     if (horizontal)
02287         SWAP(short, wcol->shadetop, wcol->shadedown);
02288     
02289     round_box_edges(&wtb, UI_CNR_ALL, rect, rad);
02290     widgetbase_draw(&wtb, wcol);
02291     
02292     /* slider */
02293     if (slider->xmax - slider->xmin < 2 || slider->ymax - slider->ymin < 2) ;
02294     else {
02295         
02296         SWAP(short, wcol->shadetop, wcol->shadedown);
02297         
02298         copy_v4_v4_char(wcol->inner, wcol->item);
02299         
02300         if (wcol->shadetop > wcol->shadedown)
02301             wcol->shadetop += 20;   /* XXX violates themes... */
02302         else wcol->shadedown += 20;
02303         
02304         if (state & UI_SCROLL_PRESSED) {
02305             wcol->inner[0] = wcol->inner[0] >= 250 ? 255 : wcol->inner[0] + 5;
02306             wcol->inner[1] = wcol->inner[1] >= 250 ? 255 : wcol->inner[1] + 5;
02307             wcol->inner[2] = wcol->inner[2] >= 250 ? 255 : wcol->inner[2] + 5;
02308         }
02309 
02310         /* draw */
02311         wtb.emboss = 0; /* only emboss once */
02312         
02313         /* exception for progress bar */
02314         if (state & UI_SCROLL_NO_OUTLINE)   
02315             SWAP(short, outline, wtb.outline);
02316         
02317         round_box_edges(&wtb, UI_CNR_ALL, slider, rad);
02318         
02319         if (state & UI_SCROLL_ARROWS) {
02320             if (wcol->item[0] > 48) wcol->item[0] -= 48;
02321             if (wcol->item[1] > 48) wcol->item[1] -= 48;
02322             if (wcol->item[2] > 48) wcol->item[2] -= 48;
02323             wcol->item[3] = 255;
02324             
02325             if (horizontal) {
02326                 widget_scroll_circle(&wtb.tria1, slider, 0.6f, 'l');
02327                 widget_scroll_circle(&wtb.tria2, slider, 0.6f, 'r');
02328             }
02329             else {
02330                 widget_scroll_circle(&wtb.tria1, slider, 0.6f, 'b');
02331                 widget_scroll_circle(&wtb.tria2, slider, 0.6f, 't');
02332             }
02333         }
02334         widgetbase_draw(&wtb, wcol);
02335         
02336         if (state & UI_SCROLL_NO_OUTLINE)
02337             SWAP(short, outline, wtb.outline);
02338     }   
02339 }
02340 
02341 static void widget_scroll(uiBut *but, uiWidgetColors *wcol, rcti *rect, int state, int UNUSED(roundboxalign))
02342 {
02343     rcti rect1;
02344     double value;
02345     float fac, size, min;
02346     int horizontal;
02347 
02348     /* calculate slider part */
02349     value = ui_get_but_val(but);
02350 
02351     size = (but->softmax + but->a1 - but->softmin);
02352     size = MAX2(size, 2);
02353     
02354     /* position */
02355     rect1 = *rect;
02356 
02357     /* determine horizontal/vertical */
02358     horizontal = (rect->xmax - rect->xmin > rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
02359     
02360     if (horizontal) {
02361         fac = (rect->xmax - rect->xmin) / (size);
02362         rect1.xmin = rect1.xmin + ceilf(fac * ((float)value - but->softmin));
02363         rect1.xmax = rect1.xmin + ceilf(fac * (but->a1 - but->softmin));
02364 
02365         /* ensure minimium size */
02366         min = rect->ymax - rect->ymin;
02367 
02368         if (rect1.xmax - rect1.xmin < min) {
02369             rect1.xmax = rect1.xmin + min;
02370 
02371             if (rect1.xmax > rect->xmax) {
02372                 rect1.xmax = rect->xmax;
02373                 rect1.xmin = MAX2(rect1.xmax - min, rect->xmin);
02374             }
02375         }
02376     }
02377     else {
02378         fac = (rect->ymax - rect->ymin) / (size);
02379         rect1.ymax = rect1.ymax - ceilf(fac * ((float)value - but->softmin));
02380         rect1.ymin = rect1.ymax - ceilf(fac * (but->a1 - but->softmin));
02381 
02382         /* ensure minimium size */
02383         min = rect->xmax - rect->xmin;
02384 
02385         if (rect1.ymax - rect1.ymin < min) {
02386             rect1.ymax = rect1.ymin + min;
02387 
02388             if (rect1.ymax > rect->ymax) {
02389                 rect1.ymax = rect->ymax;
02390                 rect1.ymin = MAX2(rect1.ymax - min, rect->ymin);
02391             }
02392         }
02393     }
02394 
02395     if (state & UI_SELECT)
02396         state = UI_SCROLL_PRESSED;
02397     else
02398         state = 0;
02399     uiWidgetScrollDraw(wcol, rect, &rect1, state);
02400 }
02401 
02402 static void widget_progressbar(uiBut *but, uiWidgetColors *wcol, rcti *rect, int UNUSED(state), int UNUSED(roundboxalign))
02403 {
02404     rcti rect_prog = *rect, rect_bar = *rect;
02405     float value = but->a1;
02406     float w, min;
02407     
02408     /* make the progress bar a proportion of the original height */
02409     /* hardcoded 4px high for now */
02410     rect_prog.ymax = rect_prog.ymin + 4;
02411     rect_bar.ymax = rect_bar.ymin + 4;
02412     
02413     w = value * (rect_prog.xmax - rect_prog.xmin);
02414     
02415     /* ensure minimium size */
02416     min = rect_prog.ymax - rect_prog.ymin;
02417     w = MAX2(w, min);
02418     
02419     rect_bar.xmax = rect_bar.xmin + w;
02420         
02421     uiWidgetScrollDraw(wcol, &rect_prog, &rect_bar, UI_SCROLL_NO_OUTLINE);
02422     
02423     /* raise text a bit */
02424     rect->ymin += 6;
02425     rect->xmin -= 6;
02426 }
02427 
02428 static void widget_link(uiBut *but, uiWidgetColors *UNUSED(wcol), rcti *rect, int UNUSED(state), int UNUSED(roundboxalign))
02429 {
02430     
02431     if (but->flag & UI_SELECT) {
02432         rcti rectlink;
02433         
02434         UI_ThemeColor(TH_TEXT_HI);
02435         
02436         rectlink.xmin = (rect->xmin + rect->xmax) / 2;
02437         rectlink.ymin = (rect->ymin + rect->ymax) / 2;
02438         rectlink.xmax = but->linkto[0];
02439         rectlink.ymax = but->linkto[1];
02440         
02441         ui_draw_link_bezier(&rectlink);
02442     }
02443 }
02444 
02445 static void widget_numslider(uiBut *but, uiWidgetColors *wcol, rcti *rect, int state, int roundboxalign)
02446 {
02447     uiWidgetBase wtb, wtb1;
02448     rcti rect1;
02449     double value;
02450     float offs, toffs, fac;
02451     char outline[3];
02452 
02453     widget_init(&wtb);
02454     widget_init(&wtb1);
02455     
02456     /* backdrop first */
02457     
02458     /* fully rounded */
02459     offs = 0.5f * (rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
02460     toffs = offs * 0.75f;
02461     round_box_edges(&wtb, roundboxalign, rect, offs);
02462 
02463     wtb.outline = 0;
02464     widgetbase_draw(&wtb, wcol);
02465     
02466     /* draw left/right parts only when not in text editing */
02467     if (!(state & UI_TEXTINPUT)) {
02468         
02469         /* slider part */
02470         copy_v3_v3_char(outline, wcol->outline);
02471         copy_v3_v3_char(wcol->outline, wcol->item);
02472         copy_v3_v3_char(wcol->inner, wcol->item);
02473 
02474         if (!(state & UI_SELECT))
02475             SWAP(short, wcol->shadetop, wcol->shadedown);
02476         
02477         rect1 = *rect;
02478         
02479         value = ui_get_but_val(but);
02480         fac = ((float)value - but->softmin) * (rect1.xmax - rect1.xmin - offs) / (but->softmax - but->softmin);
02481         
02482         /* left part of slider, always rounded */
02483         rect1.xmax = rect1.xmin + ceil(offs + 1.0f);
02484         round_box_edges(&wtb1, roundboxalign & ~(UI_CNR_TOP_RIGHT | UI_CNR_BOTTOM_RIGHT), &rect1, offs);
02485         wtb1.outline = 0;
02486         widgetbase_draw(&wtb1, wcol);
02487         
02488         /* right part of slider, interpolate roundness */
02489         rect1.xmax = rect1.xmin + fac + offs;
02490         rect1.xmin +=  floor(offs - 1.0f);
02491         if (rect1.xmax + offs > rect->xmax)
02492             offs *= (rect1.xmax + offs - rect->xmax) / offs;
02493         else 
02494             offs = 0.0f;
02495         round_box_edges(&wtb1, roundboxalign & ~(UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT | UI_CNR_BOTTOM_LEFT), &rect1, offs);
02496         
02497         widgetbase_draw(&wtb1, wcol);
02498         copy_v3_v3_char(wcol->outline, outline);
02499         
02500         if (!(state & UI_SELECT))
02501             SWAP(short, wcol->shadetop, wcol->shadedown);
02502     }
02503     
02504     /* outline */
02505     wtb.outline = 1;
02506     wtb.inner = 0;
02507     widgetbase_draw(&wtb, wcol);
02508     
02509     /* text space */
02510     rect->xmin += toffs;
02511     rect->xmax -= toffs;
02512 }
02513 
02514 /* I think 3 is sufficient border to indicate keyed status */
02515 #define SWATCH_KEYED_BORDER 3
02516 
02517 static void widget_swatch(uiBut *but, uiWidgetColors *wcol, rcti *rect, int state, int roundboxalign)
02518 {
02519     uiWidgetBase wtb;
02520     float col[4];
02521     int color_profile = but->block->color_profile;
02522     
02523     col[3] = 1.0f;
02524 
02525     if (but->rnaprop) {
02526         if (RNA_property_subtype(but->rnaprop) == PROP_COLOR_GAMMA)
02527             color_profile = BLI_PR_NONE;
02528 
02529         if (RNA_property_array_length(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop) == 4) {
02530             col[3] = RNA_property_float_get_index(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop, 3);
02531         }
02532     }
02533     
02534     widget_init(&wtb);
02535     
02536     /* half rounded */
02537     round_box_edges(&wtb, roundboxalign, rect, 5.0f);
02538         
02539     ui_get_but_vectorf(but, col);
02540     
02541     if (state & (UI_BUT_ANIMATED | UI_BUT_ANIMATED_KEY | UI_BUT_DRIVEN | UI_BUT_REDALERT)) {
02542         // draw based on state - color for keyed etc
02543         widgetbase_draw(&wtb, wcol);
02544         
02545         // inset to draw swatch color
02546         rect->xmin += SWATCH_KEYED_BORDER;
02547         rect->xmax -= SWATCH_KEYED_BORDER;
02548         rect->ymin += SWATCH_KEYED_BORDER;
02549         rect->ymax -= SWATCH_KEYED_BORDER;
02550         
02551         round_box_edges(&wtb, roundboxalign, rect, 5.0f);
02552     }
02553     
02554     if (color_profile)
02555         linearrgb_to_srgb_v3_v3(col, col);
02556     
02557     rgba_float_to_uchar((unsigned char *)wcol->inner, col);
02558 
02559     wcol->shaded = 0;
02560     wcol->alpha_check = (wcol->inner[3] < 255);
02561 
02562     widgetbase_draw(&wtb, wcol);
02563     
02564 }
02565 
02566 static void widget_icon_has_anim(uiBut *UNUSED(but), uiWidgetColors *wcol, rcti *rect, int state, int UNUSED(roundboxalign))
02567 {
02568     if (state & (UI_BUT_ANIMATED | UI_BUT_ANIMATED_KEY | UI_BUT_DRIVEN | UI_BUT_REDALERT)) {
02569         uiWidgetBase wtb;
02570     
02571         widget_init(&wtb);
02572         wtb.outline = 0;
02573         
02574         /* rounded */
02575         round_box_edges(&wtb, UI_CNR_ALL, rect, 10.0f);
02576         widgetbase_draw(&wtb, wcol);
02577     }   
02578 }

02693 static void widget_optionbut(uiWidgetColors *wcol, rcti *rect, int state, int UNUSED(roundboxalign))
02694 {
02695     uiWidgetBase wtb;
02696     rcti recttemp = *rect;
02697     int delta;
02698     
02699     widget_init(&wtb);
02700     
02701     /* square */
02702     recttemp.xmax = recttemp.xmin + (recttemp.ymax - recttemp.ymin);
02703     
02704     /* smaller */
02705     delta = 1 + (recttemp.ymax - recttemp.ymin) / 8;
02706     recttemp.xmin += delta;
02707     recttemp.ymin += delta;
02708     recttemp.xmax -= delta;
02709     recttemp.ymax -= delta;
02710     
02711     /* half rounded */
02712     round_box_edges(&wtb, UI_CNR_ALL, &recttemp, 4.0f);
02713     
02714     /* decoration */
02715     if (state & UI_SELECT) {
02716         widget_check_trias(&wtb.tria1, &recttemp);
02717     }
02718     
02719     widgetbase_draw(&wtb, wcol);
02720     
02721     /* text space */
02722     rect->xmin += (rect->ymax - rect->ymin) * 0.7 + delta;
02723 }

02738 
02739 static void widget_box(uiBut *but, uiWidgetColors *wcol, rcti *rect, int UNUSED(state), int roundboxalign)
02740 {
02741     uiWidgetBase wtb;
02742     char old_col[3];
02743     
02744     widget_init(&wtb);
02745     
02746     copy_v3_v3_char(old_col, wcol->inner);
02747     
02748     /* abuse but->hsv - if it's non-zero, use this color as the box's background */
02749     if (but->col[3]) {
02750         wcol->inner[0] = but->col[0];
02751         wcol->inner[1] = but->col[1];
02752         wcol->inner[2] = but->col[2];
02753     }
02754     
02755     /* half rounded */
02756     round_box_edges(&wtb, roundboxalign, rect, 4.0f);
02757     
02758     widgetbase_draw(&wtb, wcol);
02759     
02760     /* store the box bg as gl clearcolor, to retrieve later when drawing semi-transparent rects
02761      * over the top to indicate disabled buttons */
02762     /* XXX, this doesnt work right since the color applies to buttons outside the box too. */
02763     glClearColor(wcol->inner[0] / 255.0, wcol->inner[1] / 255.0, wcol->inner[2] / 255.0, 1.0);
02764     
02765     copy_v3_v3_char(wcol->inner, old_col);
02766 }
02767 
02768 static void widget_but(uiWidgetColors *wcol, rcti *rect, int UNUSED(state), int roundboxalign)
02769 {
02770     uiWidgetBase wtb;
02771     
02772     widget_init(&wtb);
02773     
02774     /* half rounded */
02775     round_box_edges(&wtb, roundboxalign, rect, 4.0f);
02776         
02777     widgetbase_draw(&wtb, wcol);
02778 
02779 }
02780 
02781 static void widget_roundbut(uiWidgetColors *wcol, rcti *rect, int UNUSED(state), int roundboxalign)
02782 {
02783     uiWidgetBase wtb;
02784     float rad = 5.0f; //0.5f*(rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
02785     
02786     widget_init(&wtb);
02787     
02788     /* half rounded */
02789     round_box_edges(&wtb, roundboxalign, rect, rad);
02790 
02791     widgetbase_draw(&wtb, wcol);
02792 }
02793 
02794 static void widget_draw_extra_mask(const bContext *C, uiBut *but, uiWidgetType *wt, rcti *rect)
02795 {
02796     uiWidgetBase wtb;
02797     unsigned char col[4];
02798     
02799     /* state copy! */
02800     wt->wcol = *(wt->wcol_theme);
02801     
02802     widget_init(&wtb);
02803     
02804     if (but->block->drawextra) {
02805         /* note: drawextra can change rect +1 or -1, to match round errors of existing previews */
02806         but->block->drawextra(C, but->poin, but->block->drawextra_arg1, but->block->drawextra_arg2, rect);
02807         
02808         /* make mask to draw over image */
02809         UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_BACK, col);
02810         glColor3ubv(col);
02811         
02812         round_box__edges(&wtb, UI_CNR_ALL, rect, 0.0f, 4.0);
02813         widgetbase_outline(&wtb);
02814     }
02815     
02816     /* outline */
02817     round_box_edges(&wtb, UI_CNR_ALL, rect, 5.0f);
02818     wtb.outline = 1;
02819     wtb.inner = 0;
02820     widgetbase_draw(&wtb, &wt->wcol);
02821     
02822 }
02823 
02824 
02825 static void widget_disabled(rcti *rect)
02826 {
02827     float col[4];
02828     
02829     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
02830     
02831     /* can't use theme TH_BACK or TH_PANEL... undefined */
02832     glGetFloatv(GL_COLOR_CLEAR_VALUE, col);
02833     glColor4f(col[0], col[1], col[2], 0.5f);
02834 
02835     /* need -1 and +1 to make it work right for aligned buttons,
02836      * but problem may be somewhere else? */
02837     glRectf(rect->xmin - 1, rect->ymin - 1, rect->xmax, rect->ymax + 1);
02838     
02839     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
02840 }
02841 
02842 static uiWidgetType *widget_type(uiWidgetTypeEnum type)
02843 {
02844     bTheme *btheme = UI_GetTheme();
02845     static uiWidgetType wt;
02846     
02847     /* defaults */
02848     wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_regular;
02849     wt.wcol_state = &btheme->tui.wcol_state;
02850     wt.state = widget_state;
02851     wt.draw = widget_but;
02852     wt.custom = NULL;
02853     wt.text = widget_draw_text_icon;
02854     
02855     switch (type) {
02856         case UI_WTYPE_REGULAR:
02857             break;
02858 
02859         case UI_WTYPE_LABEL:
02860             wt.draw = NULL;
02861             wt.state = widget_state_label;
02862             break;
02863             
02864         case UI_WTYPE_TOGGLE:
02865             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_toggle;
02866             break;
02867             
02868         case UI_WTYPE_OPTION:
02869             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_option;
02870             wt.draw = widget_optionbut;
02871             break;
02872             
02873         case UI_WTYPE_RADIO:
02874             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_radio;
02875             wt.draw = widget_radiobut;
02876             break;
02877 
02878         case UI_WTYPE_NUMBER:
02879             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_num;
02880             wt.draw = widget_numbut;
02881             break;
02882             
02883         case UI_WTYPE_SLIDER:
02884             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_numslider;
02885             wt.custom = widget_numslider;
02886             wt.state = widget_state_numslider;
02887             break;
02888             
02889         case UI_WTYPE_EXEC:
02890             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_tool;
02891             wt.draw = widget_roundbut;
02892             break;
02893 
02894         case UI_WTYPE_TOOLTIP:
02895             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_tooltip;
02896             wt.draw = widget_menu_back;
02897             break;
02898             
02899             
02900         /* strings */
02901         case UI_WTYPE_NAME:
02902             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_text;
02903             wt.draw = widget_textbut;
02904             break;
02905             
02906         case UI_WTYPE_NAME_LINK:
02907             break;
02908             
02909         case UI_WTYPE_POINTER_LINK:
02910             break;
02911             
02912         case UI_WTYPE_FILENAME:
02913             break;
02914             
02915             
02916         /* start menus */
02917         case UI_WTYPE_MENU_RADIO:
02918             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_menu;
02919             wt.draw = widget_menubut;
02920             break;
02921 
02922         case UI_WTYPE_MENU_ICON_RADIO:
02923             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_menu;
02924             wt.draw = widget_menuiconbut;
02925             break;
02926             
02927         case UI_WTYPE_MENU_POINTER_LINK:
02928             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_menu;
02929             wt.draw = widget_menubut;
02930             break;
02931 
02932         case UI_WTYPE_MENU_NODE_LINK:
02933             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_menu;
02934             wt.draw = widget_menunodebut;
02935             break;
02936             
02937         case UI_WTYPE_PULLDOWN:
02938             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_pulldown;
02939             wt.draw = widget_pulldownbut;
02940             wt.state = widget_state_pulldown;
02941             break;
02942             
02943         /* in menus */
02944         case UI_WTYPE_MENU_ITEM:
02945             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_menu_item;
02946             wt.draw = widget_menu_itembut;
02947             wt.state = widget_state_menu_item;
02948             break;
02949             
02950         case UI_WTYPE_MENU_BACK:
02951             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_menu_back;
02952             wt.draw = widget_menu_back;
02953             break;
02954             
02955         /* specials */
02956         case UI_WTYPE_ICON:
02957             wt.custom = widget_icon_has_anim;
02958             break;
02959             
02960         case UI_WTYPE_SWATCH:
02961             wt.custom = widget_swatch;
02962             break;
02963             
02964         case UI_WTYPE_BOX:
02965             wt.custom = widget_box;
02966             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_box;
02967             break;
02968             
02969         case UI_WTYPE_RGB_PICKER:
02970             break;
02971             
02972         case UI_WTYPE_NORMAL:
02973             break;
02974 
02975         case UI_WTYPE_SCROLL:
02976             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_scroll;
02977             wt.state = widget_state_nothing;
02978             wt.custom = widget_scroll;
02979             break;
02980 
02981         case UI_WTYPE_LISTITEM:
02982             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_list_item;
02983             wt.draw = widget_list_itembut;
02984             break;
02985             
02986         case UI_WTYPE_PROGRESSBAR:
02987             wt.wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_progress;
02988             wt.custom = widget_progressbar;
02989             break;
02990     }
02991     
02992     return &wt;
02993 }
02994 
02995 
02996 static int widget_roundbox_set(uiBut *but, rcti *rect)
02997 {
02998     /* alignment */
02999     if (but->flag & UI_BUT_ALIGN) {
03000         
03001         if (but->flag & UI_BUT_ALIGN_TOP)
03002             rect->ymax += 1;
03003         if (but->flag & UI_BUT_ALIGN_LEFT)
03004             rect->xmin -= 1;
03005         
03006         switch (but->flag & UI_BUT_ALIGN) {
03007             case UI_BUT_ALIGN_TOP:
03008                 return UI_CNR_BOTTOM_LEFT | UI_CNR_BOTTOM_RIGHT;
03009             case UI_BUT_ALIGN_DOWN:
03010                 return UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT | UI_CNR_TOP_RIGHT;
03011             case UI_BUT_ALIGN_LEFT:
03012                 return UI_CNR_TOP_RIGHT | UI_CNR_BOTTOM_RIGHT;
03013             case UI_BUT_ALIGN_RIGHT:
03014                 return UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT | UI_CNR_BOTTOM_LEFT;
03015             case UI_BUT_ALIGN_DOWN | UI_BUT_ALIGN_RIGHT:
03016                 return UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT;
03017             case UI_BUT_ALIGN_DOWN | UI_BUT_ALIGN_LEFT:
03018                 return UI_CNR_TOP_RIGHT;
03019             case UI_BUT_ALIGN_TOP | UI_BUT_ALIGN_RIGHT:
03020                 return UI_CNR_BOTTOM_LEFT;
03021             case UI_BUT_ALIGN_TOP | UI_BUT_ALIGN_LEFT:
03022                 return UI_CNR_BOTTOM_RIGHT;
03023             default:
03024                 return 0;
03025         }
03026     }
03027 
03028     return UI_CNR_ALL;
03029 }
03030 
03031 /* conversion from old to new buttons, so still messy */
03032 void ui_draw_but(const bContext *C, ARegion *ar, uiStyle *style, uiBut *but, rcti *rect)
03033 {
03034     bTheme *btheme = UI_GetTheme();
03035     ThemeUI *tui = &btheme->tui;
03036     uiFontStyle *fstyle = &style->widget;
03037     uiWidgetType *wt = NULL;
03038 
03039     /* handle menus separately */
03040     if (but->dt == UI_EMBOSSP) {
03041         switch (but->type) {
03042             case LABEL:
03043                 widget_draw_text_icon(&style->widgetlabel, &tui->wcol_menu_back, but, rect);
03044                 break;
03045             case SEPR:
03046                 ui_draw_separator(rect, &tui->wcol_menu_item);
03047                 break;
03048                 
03049             default:
03050                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_MENU_ITEM);
03051         }
03052     }
03053     else if (but->dt == UI_EMBOSSN) {
03054         /* "nothing" */
03055         wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_ICON);
03056     }
03057     else {
03058         
03059         switch (but->type) {
03060             case LABEL:
03061                 if (but->block->flag & UI_BLOCK_LOOP)
03062                     widget_draw_text_icon(&style->widgetlabel, &tui->wcol_menu_back, but, rect);
03063                 else {
03064                     wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_LABEL);
03065                     fstyle = &style->widgetlabel;
03066                 }
03067                 break;
03068                 
03069             case SEPR:
03070                 break;
03071                 
03072             case BUT:
03073                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_EXEC);
03074                 break;
03075 
03076             case NUM:
03077                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_NUMBER);
03078                 break;
03079                 
03080             case NUMSLI:
03081             case HSVSLI:
03082                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_SLIDER);
03083                 break;
03084                 
03085             case ROW:
03086                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_RADIO);
03087                 break;
03088 
03089             case LISTROW:
03090                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_LISTITEM);
03091                 break;
03092                 
03093             case TEX:
03094                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_NAME);
03095                 break;
03096                 
03097             case SEARCH_MENU:
03098                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_NAME);
03099                 if (but->block->flag & UI_BLOCK_LOOP)
03100                     wt->wcol_theme = &btheme->tui.wcol_menu_back;
03101                 break;
03102                 
03103             case TOGBUT:
03104             case TOG:
03105             case TOGN:
03106             case TOG3:
03107                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_TOGGLE);
03108                 break;
03109                 
03110             case OPTION:
03111             case OPTIONN:
03112                 if (!(but->flag & UI_HAS_ICON)) {
03113                     wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_OPTION);
03114                     but->flag |= UI_TEXT_LEFT;
03115                 }
03116                 else
03117                     wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_TOGGLE);
03118                 
03119                 /* option buttons have strings outside, on menus use different colors */
03120                 if (but->block->flag & UI_BLOCK_LOOP)
03121                     wt->state = widget_state_option_menu;
03122                 
03123                 break;
03124                 
03125             case MENU:
03126             case BLOCK:
03127             case ICONTEXTROW:
03128                 if (but->flag & UI_BUT_NODE_LINK)
03129                     wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_MENU_NODE_LINK);
03130                 else if (!but->str[0] && but->icon)
03131                     wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_MENU_ICON_RADIO);
03132                 else
03133                     wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_MENU_RADIO);
03134                 break;
03135                 
03136             case PULLDOWN:
03137                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_PULLDOWN);
03138                 break;
03139             
03140             case BUTM:
03141                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_MENU_ITEM);
03142                 break;
03143                 
03144             case COL:
03145                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_SWATCH);
03146                 break;
03147                 
03148             case ROUNDBOX:
03149             case LISTBOX:
03150                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_BOX);
03151                 break;
03152                 
03153             case LINK:
03154             case INLINK:
03155                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_ICON);
03156                 wt->custom = widget_link;
03157                 
03158                 break;
03159             
03160             case BUT_EXTRA:
03161                 widget_draw_extra_mask(C, but, widget_type(UI_WTYPE_BOX), rect);
03162                 break;
03163                 
03164             case HSVCUBE:
03165                 if (but->a1 == UI_GRAD_V_ALT) // vertical V slider, uses new widget draw now
03166                     ui_draw_but_HSV_v(but, rect);
03167                 else  // other HSV pickers...
03168                     ui_draw_but_HSVCUBE(but, rect);
03169                 break;
03170                 
03171             case HSVCIRCLE:
03172                 ui_draw_but_HSVCIRCLE(but, &tui->wcol_regular, rect);
03173                 break;
03174                 
03175             case BUT_COLORBAND:
03176                 ui_draw_but_COLORBAND(but, &tui->wcol_regular, rect);
03177                 break;
03178                 
03179             case BUT_NORMAL:
03180                 ui_draw_but_NORMAL(but, &tui->wcol_regular, rect);
03181                 break;
03182                 
03183             case BUT_IMAGE:
03184                 ui_draw_but_IMAGE(ar, but, &tui->wcol_regular, rect);
03185                 break;
03186             
03187             case HISTOGRAM:
03188                 ui_draw_but_HISTOGRAM(ar, but, &tui->wcol_regular, rect);
03189                 break;
03190                 
03191             case WAVEFORM:
03192                 ui_draw_but_WAVEFORM(ar, but, &tui->wcol_regular, rect);
03193                 break;
03194                 
03195             case VECTORSCOPE:
03196                 ui_draw_but_VECTORSCOPE(ar, but, &tui->wcol_regular, rect);
03197                 break;
03198                     
03199             case BUT_CURVE:
03200                 ui_draw_but_CURVE(ar, but, &tui->wcol_regular, rect);
03201                 break;
03202                 
03203             case PROGRESSBAR:
03204                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_PROGRESSBAR);
03205                 fstyle = &style->widgetlabel;
03206                 break;
03207 
03208             case SCROLL:
03209                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_SCROLL);
03210                 break;
03211 
03212             case TRACKPREVIEW:
03213                 ui_draw_but_TRACKPREVIEW(ar, but, &tui->wcol_regular, rect);
03214                 break;
03215 
03216             default:
03217                 wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_REGULAR);
03218         }
03219     }
03220     
03221     if (wt) {
03222         rcti disablerect = *rect; /* rect gets clipped smaller for text */
03223         int roundboxalign, state;
03224         
03225         roundboxalign = widget_roundbox_set(but, rect);
03226 
03227         state = but->flag;
03228         if (but->editstr) state |= UI_TEXTINPUT;
03229         
03230         wt->state(wt, state);
03231         if (wt->custom)
03232             wt->custom(but, &wt->wcol, rect, state, roundboxalign);
03233         else if (wt->draw)
03234             wt->draw(&wt->wcol, rect, state, roundboxalign);
03235         wt->text(fstyle, &wt->wcol, but, rect);
03236         
03237         if (state & (UI_BUT_DISABLED | UI_BUT_INACTIVE))
03238             if (but->dt != UI_EMBOSSP)
03239                 widget_disabled(&disablerect);
03240     }
03241 }
03242 
03243 void ui_draw_menu_back(uiStyle *UNUSED(style), uiBlock *block, rcti *rect)
03244 {
03245     uiWidgetType *wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_MENU_BACK);
03246     
03247     wt->state(wt, 0);
03248     if (block)
03249         wt->draw(&wt->wcol, rect, block->flag, block->direction);
03250     else
03251         wt->draw(&wt->wcol, rect, 0, 0);
03252     
03253     if (block) {
03254         if (block->flag & UI_BLOCK_CLIPTOP) {
03255             /* XXX no scaling for UI here yet */
03256             glColor3ubv((unsigned char *)wt->wcol.text);
03257             UI_DrawTriIcon((rect->xmax + rect->xmin) / 2, rect->ymax - 8, 't');
03258         }
03259         if (block->flag & UI_BLOCK_CLIPBOTTOM) {
03260             /* XXX no scaling for UI here yet */
03261             glColor3ubv((unsigned char *)wt->wcol.text);
03262             UI_DrawTriIcon((rect->xmax + rect->xmin) / 2, rect->ymin + 10, 'v');
03263         }
03264     }   
03265 }
03266 
03267 uiWidgetColors *ui_tooltip_get_theme(void)
03268 {
03269     uiWidgetType *wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_TOOLTIP);
03270     return wt->wcol_theme;
03271 }
03272 
03273 void ui_draw_tooltip_background(uiStyle *UNUSED(style), uiBlock *UNUSED(block), rcti *rect)
03274 {
03275     uiWidgetType *wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_TOOLTIP);
03276     wt->state(wt, 0);
03277     /* wt->draw ends up using same function to draw the tooltip as menu_back */
03278     wt->draw(&wt->wcol, rect, 0, 0);
03279 }
03280 
03281 void ui_draw_search_back(uiStyle *UNUSED(style), uiBlock *block, rcti *rect)
03282 {
03283     uiWidgetType *wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_BOX);
03284     
03285     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
03286     widget_softshadow(rect, UI_CNR_ALL, 5.0f, 8.0f);
03287     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
03288 
03289     wt->state(wt, 0);
03290     if (block)
03291         wt->draw(&wt->wcol, rect, block->flag, UI_CNR_ALL);
03292     else
03293         wt->draw(&wt->wcol, rect, 0, UI_CNR_ALL);
03294     
03295 }
03296 
03297 
03298 /* helper call to draw a menu item without button */
03299 /* state: UI_ACTIVE or 0 */
03300 void ui_draw_menu_item(uiFontStyle *fstyle, rcti *rect, const char *name, int iconid, int state)
03301 {
03302     uiWidgetType *wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_MENU_ITEM);
03303     rcti _rect = *rect;
03304     char *cpoin;
03305     
03306     wt->state(wt, state);
03307     wt->draw(&wt->wcol, rect, 0, 0);
03308     
03309     uiStyleFontSet(fstyle);
03310     fstyle->align = UI_STYLE_TEXT_LEFT;
03311     
03312     /* text location offset */
03313     rect->xmin += 5;
03314     if (iconid) rect->xmin += UI_DPI_ICON_SIZE;
03315 
03316     /* cut string in 2 parts? */
03317     cpoin = strchr(name, '|');
03318     if (cpoin) {
03319         *cpoin = 0;
03320         rect->xmax -= BLF_width(fstyle->uifont_id, cpoin + 1) + 10;
03321     }
03322     
03323     glColor3ubv((unsigned char *)wt->wcol.text);
03324     uiStyleFontDraw(fstyle, rect, name);
03325     
03326     /* part text right aligned */
03327     if (cpoin) {
03328         fstyle->align = UI_STYLE_TEXT_RIGHT;
03329         rect->xmax = _rect.xmax - 5;
03330         uiStyleFontDraw(fstyle, rect, cpoin + 1);
03331         *cpoin = '|';
03332     }
03333     
03334     /* restore rect, was messed with */
03335     *rect = _rect;
03336 
03337     if (iconid) {
03338         int xs = rect->xmin + 4;
03339         int ys = 1 + (rect->ymin + rect->ymax - UI_DPI_ICON_SIZE) / 2;
03340         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
03341         UI_icon_draw_aspect(xs, ys, iconid, 1.2f, 0.5f); /* XXX scale weak get from fstyle? */
03342         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
03343     }
03344 }
03345 
03346 void ui_draw_preview_item(uiFontStyle *fstyle, rcti *rect, const char *name, int iconid, int state)
03347 {
03348     rcti trect = *rect, bg_rect;
03349     float font_dims[2] = {0.0f, 0.0f};
03350     uiWidgetType *wt = widget_type(UI_WTYPE_MENU_ITEM);
03351     unsigned char bg_col[3];
03352     
03353     wt->state(wt, state);
03354     wt->draw(&wt->wcol, rect, 0, 0);
03355     
03356     widget_draw_preview(iconid, 1.0f, rect);
03357     
03358     BLF_width_and_height(fstyle->uifont_id, name, &font_dims[0], &font_dims[1]);
03359 
03360     /* text rect */
03361     trect.xmin += 0;
03362     trect.xmax = trect.xmin + font_dims[0] + 10;
03363     trect.ymin += 10;
03364     trect.ymax = trect.ymin + font_dims[1];
03365     if (trect.xmax > rect->xmax - PREVIEW_PAD)
03366         trect.xmax = rect->xmax - PREVIEW_PAD;
03367 
03368     bg_rect = trect;
03369     bg_rect.xmin = rect->xmin + PREVIEW_PAD;
03370     bg_rect.ymin = rect->ymin + PREVIEW_PAD;
03371     bg_rect.xmax = rect->xmax - PREVIEW_PAD;
03372     bg_rect.ymax += PREVIEW_PAD / 2;
03373     
03374     if (bg_rect.xmax > rect->xmax - PREVIEW_PAD)
03375         bg_rect.xmax = rect->xmax - PREVIEW_PAD;
03376 
03377     UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_BUTBACK, bg_col);
03378     glColor4ubv((unsigned char *)wt->wcol.item);
03379     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
03380     glRecti(bg_rect.xmin, bg_rect.ymin, bg_rect.xmax, bg_rect.ymax);
03381     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
03382     
03383     if (state == UI_ACTIVE)
03384         glColor3ubv((unsigned char *)wt->wcol.text);
03385     else
03386         glColor3ubv((unsigned char *)wt->wcol.text_sel);
03387
